Markets: Investors had a Spock-like reaction <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yank_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C83d31dc3> to January’s hot inflation report. While volatility was expected, stocks mostly kept it chill and closed out the day mixed. Tech, led by Nvidia and Tesla, had it better than other sectors.

About the inflation report: Consumer price data showed it’ll be a long and winding road <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yano_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C44d974ea> back to normal inflation levels. While inflation continued to cool last month, it did so at a snail’s pace (prices grew 6.4% annually, compared to 6.5% the month earlier). And prices for a variety of goods and services, such as groceries and rent, continued to climb considerably. Egg prices in January were up 70% from the prior year.

 

SCIENCE

Breakthrough for men’s birth control <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yakE_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2D6fbc72f5> The Office boss says snip snap <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yakE_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2E6fbc72f5> The Office/NBCUniversal via Giphy
Researchers revealed on Tuesday (yep, Valentine’s Day) that a birth control pill for men is yielding promising results <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yakI_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C9a6d7fee> in the lab. Because of the unique way it prevents pregnancy, this pill could become the first legit contraception alternative to vasectomies and condoms for men.

How it works: The new pill, developed by Weill Cornell Medical scientists, temporarily immobilizes sperm by blocking a protein called soluble adenylyl cyclase, or “sAC,” that triggers sperm to swim to an egg. In the lab, the pill successfully prevented male mice from siring baby mice (aka “pinkies,” fun mouse fact) for a couple of hours—though they hope to extend that window to a day or two. Up next: tests on rabbits, which apparently WooHoo kind of like humans.

So, it’s like Viagra for preventing pregnancy

That’s a big deal for getting it approved <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yakM_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C47153bab> by the FDA. The fact that this experimental birth control pill wears off over time makes it similar to two pills that are already on the market, Viagra and Cialis.

Like those ED treatments, the sperm-stunning pill also has short-term side effects—which represents a vast improvement over other pill experiments.

Previous attempts at developing a male birth control pill required men to take hormonal medications for months to prevent sperm from being formed in the first place.

Long-term use of these pills caused ongoing side effects—like acne, weight gain, and mood swings—that lasted for months after stopping use of the pill.

If your eyes just rolled to the back of your head—yep, those are the exact same side effects women experience from taking hormonal birth control. But, from the FDA’s perspective, the risk of side effects from hormonal birth control far outweigh the risks involved in a pregnancy for women.

Looking ahead…the Weill Cornell researchers who developed the new pill seem confident: They already formed a company, Sacyl Pharmaceuticals, to produce the pill.—JW

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yakQ_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C97da7a34>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yakU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cdf5bee26>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yakY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C1dbbcca2>   

TOGETHER WITH REVELA

Unlock luscious locks <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yZmo_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4JmxwPXRpdGxl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C74b200ea> Revela <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yZmo_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4JmxwPWltYWdl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C49ea78be>
Is hair loss and thinning holding you back from the thicker mane of your dreams? Revela’s proprietary AI search engine has discovered a revolutionary new formula to reinvigorate your ’do—and fast.

As the world’s first (and only) molecule discovered by AI to help combat the causes of hair loss, ProCelinyl™ works by reawakening dormant follicles to promote thicker hair <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yZmo_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4JmxwPXRleHQx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C03531ec0>, with a 97% success rate in clinical trials.

That’s right. A whole 97% of users saw real results <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yZmo_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4JmxwPXRleHQy/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C7be5a743>.

And Revela is so confident in their game-changing formula, all of their products come with a money-back guarantee.

The future of haircare is here. Snag a bottle of Revela’s breakthrough before it’s gone, with 15% off for a limited time <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yZmo_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4JmxwPXRleHQz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cee125758>.



WORLD

Tour de headlines Flight path of United Airlines flight leaving Hawaii Flightradar24
Feds probe United Airlines near-disaster. That flight path you see above is not how a takeoff is supposed to go. But that’s what happened to a United flight that left Maui in December—after climbing in normal fashion for about a minute, it dove to within 800 feet of the Pacific Ocean before regaining altitude. The public didn’t know about this until The Air Current published an article <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yazY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C5a671528> about the incident on Sunday, and now the National Transportation Safety Board has begun <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yazc_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C15e23e6a> a formal review.

US offers explanation for UFOs. The three unidentified objects recently shot down by the US military weren’t sent by aliens, and they probably weren’t spy balloons <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yakc_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C4a203f85>, either, the Biden administration claimed. Instead, they could have just been balloons “tied to some commercial or benign purpose,” John Kirby of the National Security Council said. We also learned that the first missile strike intended to bring down an object over Lake Huron on Sunday missed its target, but the second one hit. Not surprised the jets threw incomplete passes…

BFPD: That stands for “big freakin’ plane deal,” because Air India, Boeing, and Airbus just linked up for the largest commercial aircraft deal <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yakg_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C440a471d> in history. The airline placed an order for 250 Airbus planes and 220 Boeing jets in a bid to win back Indian passengers who’ve increasingly used Gulf carriers like Emirates and Qatar Airways to crisscross the globe. It’s unclear how much these 470 planes will cost Air India, since manufacturers typically offer heavy discounts from list prices.

LUXURY

Louis Vuitton taps Pharrell to lead menswear design <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yakk_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Dd4b8deb2> Pharrell Williams <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yakk_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ed4b8deb2> Clive Mason/Getty Images
Pharrell Williams has finally escaped from the shadow of Big Hat to become the creative director <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yako_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C351f6eee> of menswear at Louis Vuitton, the world’s biggest luxury brand. The music producer, streetwear entrepreneur, and costar of that Maggie Rogers NYU video will fill the role previously held by Virgil Abloh, the first Black American to lead design at a European luxury house, who died in 2021.

The appointment extends Pharrell’s already considerable fashion resume: He’s the founder of streetwear labels Billionaire Boys Club and IceCream, and has collaborated with companies like Adidas, Chanel, and Moncler. Williams’s first collection for LV will debut during the Paris men’s fashion week this June.

By partnering with big names and celebs, Louis Vuitton parent company LVMH has charted a different course from competitors like Kering, which recently tapped a little-known Italian designer for the creative director position at Gucci.

Looking ahead…Louis Vuitton hopes that Williams will help juice its incredible growth run. Four years ago, the company became the first luxury brand to break $10 billion in sales and has doubled that figure since. That’s helped make LVMH Europe’s most valuable company and its owner, Bernard Arnault, the world’s richest person.—MK

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yaks_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cfb3fcb4f>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yakw_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cd3c3412d>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yak0_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C689dce06>   

TOGETHER WITH BELAY

BELAY <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yZms_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4JmxwPWltYWdl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cba694903>
Loosen your grip. Great leaders know how to let go. BELAY makes it easy to delegate important tasks with US-based virtual assistants and accounting specialists. Their guide <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yZms_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4JmxwPXRleHQx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C69f735b6> explains how delegating can help you save 15 hours per week, giving you more time and less to juggle. REAL ESTATE

Life partners make even better rent partners <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yak4_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Dcb51cc3e> Will Smith in an empty room <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yak4_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ecb51cc3e> Fresh Prince of Bel-Air/Warner Bros. Television
Staying single is almost as much of a drain on your checking account as it is on your parents’ patience. According to a Zillow report <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yak8_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C1a17e46e> released ahead of Valentine’s Day, single people in the US pay $7,000 more in rent annually in what’s known as a “singles tax”. Conversely, a couple living together can save $14,000 a year on average by splitting the rent.

Zillow’s analysis looked at folks living alone in one-bedroom apartments, and its findings varied greatly by region: Lone New Yorkers bear the highest “singles tax” of $19,500, while the single premium is cheapest in Cleveland and Detroit at $4,387 and $4,483, respectively.

Does “single” mean “broke”?

Research shows that young married couples typically have a higher net worth, at least in part because they’re able to pool their rent savings and potentially use them for a down payment on a home. But don’t despair if you’re as single as Fleabag: Craigslist could be a stand-in for Hinge, since finding a roommate can offset some of the financial burden of chronic singlehood.

Zoom out: A hot rental market is straining Americans’ budgets more than it has in the past, with a growing number of US adults living alone: The share of one-person households has more than doubled since 1960 to 28% in 2021.—SK

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yalA_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cbd5a7c3e>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yalE_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Bb5c87a83>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yalI_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cb473d8ad>

Over on the broadcast side, Sunday’s Super Bowl was the third-most watched TV show of all time, drawing 113 million viewers. That’s a slight uptick in viewership from the year before.

Quote: “I’m not going to be that guy.”

Actor Idris Elba quashed speculation <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yalQ_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C2dfa52f2> that he will be the next James Bond after Daniel Craig. Instead of playing 007, Elba said he’s focused on his role as detective John Luther. “That’s who I am,” he said.

NEWS

What else is brewing
Tesla employees <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yazg_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C40836f4b> at a Buffalo, NY, plant said they plan to unionize, which would be a first for the company.

Airbnb <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yazk_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C22448cf5> scored its first annual profit as a company in 2022 thanks to surging demand for travel.

Nikki Haley <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yalg_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C869383d5>, the former governor of South Carolina, announced she was running for president. She’s the first major GOP candidate to jump into the race against Trump.

Subway <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30554357.3480248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8yalk_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDU1NDM1Ny4zNDgwMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cbeb451c7> confirmed it’s exploring a sale. It could be valued at more than $10 billion.

 TOGETHER WITH

Facet <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xLW0_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgxJmxwPWxvZ28/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C03e42d81> 
Good morning. Being the “designated survivor” isn’t just the excuse that Neal has used to skip every writers’ meeting since August.

It’s a US government tradition that’s been performed during each State of the Union address since the 1950s. How it works: A lone government official, typically a low-level Cabinet member, rides out the speech in an undisclosed location so that they could continue running the country if something really bad happens at the Capitol.

Last night, the designated survivor was Labor Secretary Marty Walsh (but we all know it should’ve been Pedro Pascal).

—Max Knoblauch, Sam Klebanov, Matty Merritt, Neal Freyman

Markets: Fed Chair Jerome Powell has the power to tank stocks, but also to send them higher—like he did yesterday, when he confirmed that disinflation “has begun <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX2s_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C085bd64e>.” Meanwhile, the Bed Bath & Beyond roller-coaster ride shows no signs of slowing down. The retailer’s stock flopped after it secured last-ditch financing to avoid bankruptcy, but shareholders hated the deal because it will dilute their equity.

 

TECH

Bing wants to send Google to Page 2 <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX2w_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2D55f3c229> Microsoft Bing search <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX2w_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2E55f3c229> Francis Scialabba
After spending years as a punchline, Microsoft’s Bing search engine has completed its Rocky training montage and is ready to get back in the ring. Yesterday, Microsoft announced <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX20_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cf6d12631> an AI-powered revamp of Bing that’s expected to reignite a dormant battle with Google over its search dominance.

During a surprise event, Microsoft said that the tech behind OpenAI’s ChatGPT would be integrated into Bing, resulting in a new breed of search engine where answers will be more direct and conversational, as opposed to the typical ad-packed list of links.

Bing will run on newer and more powerful software than ChatGPT, and will provide faster, more humanlike replies, Microsoft said.

Will those replies be accurate? Time will tell.

Google has been preparing for this. In a Minority Report-esque pre-response to the Bing news, Google on Monday announced plans to integrate its vaunted search engine with its own ChatGPT rival called Bard, which will be made available to the public in the coming weeks. Google’s been nervously watching ChatGPT since the chatbot’s release, when it declared the tech a “code red” for Google’s search business.

The race is on

The two tech behemoths are scrambling to capitalize on so-called “generative AI,” with Microsoft motivated by an opportunity to claw back some of Google Search’s market share (~93%), and Google motivated to hold on tight. And, given changing search behavior—younger internet users are increasingly using TikTok and Instagram for recommendations—both companies know that evolution is necessary.

For some sectors, the economic impact of an AI-first era of search could be as rough as ChatGPT’s attempts to write a funny cartoon <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX24_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cff8c2e83>. Publishers would likely lose out on referral clicks, given AI’s direct answers, and the tech giants themselves would need to rethink how their own ad services work.

But Microsoft and Google think the ultimate promise of AI vastly outweighs short-term hiccups, and both are pouring gobs of money into boosting their AI capabilities. Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella told CNBC <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX1M_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cb023670c>, “I have not seen something like this since I would say 2007–2008, when the cloud was just first coming out.”—MK

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX28_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C039f240e>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX3A_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C89d5952a>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX3E_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C0a342694>   

TOGETHER WITH FACET

Make the right money moves <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xLW0_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgxJmxwPXRpdGxl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C59897a67> Facet <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xLW0_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgxJmxwPWltYWdl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ccc21296b>
Layoffs + inflation + high interest rates = an overwhelmed you. Let Facet’s dependable financial advice and services be your calm in this financial storm.

A Facet membership <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xLW4_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgxJmxwPXRleHQx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C0e1fbe84> includes your own CFP® professional + a team of financial experts who deliver personalized, affordable financial advice for all aspects of your life, giving you peace of mind and peace of wallet.

And here’s a $500 kick-start: Facet is offering $250 into your brokerage account <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xLW0_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgxJmxwPXRleHQy/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cec121906> if you invest $5k within your first 90 days. WORLD

Tour de headlines Preside Biden at the State of the Union Photo by Win McNamee/Getty Images
He’s in love with the State of U: In his fiesty State of the Union address <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX1Q_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C5cca6958>, President Biden touted the booming jobs market, disinflation over the last six months, and new laws such as the Inflation Reduction Act as symbols of the “progress and resilience” of the United States. Though he stressed bipartisanship throughout the speech, he was frequently heckled by some Republicans…and seemed to relish the back-and-forth.

Other SOTU notes: While Biden spent most of his speech recapping his accomplishments, he proposed several agenda items for the remainder of his term, including expanding the $35 price cap on insulin to everyone (not only those on Medicare) and cracking down on excessive fees for things like concert tickets and hotels. As for the spy balloon drama that hovered over the speech, Biden addressed it indirectly, saying if China threatens US sovereignty, “we will act to protect our country. And we did.”

Zoom hits its limit. The videoconferencing company that became a household name during Covid is cutting 15% of its workforce <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX3I_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cafb6c9d8>, or about 1,300 people. CEO Eric Yuan said the “uncertainty of the global economy” was partly to blame, but he also admitted the company “made mistakes.” To own up to those mistakes, Yuan said he’s reducing his upcoming fiscal year salary by 98% and ditching his 2023 corporate bonus. Zoom shares are down about 85% from their 2020 highs.

SCIENCE

There’s no way to predict an earthquake <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX3M_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2D88b27422> Birds perched on seismic waves <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX3M_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2E88b27422> Illustration: Dianna “Mick” McDougall, Source: Getty Images
Two major earthquakes that struck <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX3Q_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C388c3f70> parts of Turkey and Syria on Monday have left more than 7,700 people dead and many more injured. Search efforts for survivors that may still be trapped under collapsed structures are ongoing—but time is running out <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX3U_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cdb452ffe>.

The suddenness of the earthquakes has raised questions over whether anyone could have seen it coming. After all, we’ve long relied on meteorologists for a heads-up on other natural disasters, like hurricanes.

Seismologists say it can’t be done

According to the US Geological Survey (USGS), scientists have failed <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX3Y_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cc7846112> to predict a single major earthquake. Statistical models can determine the probability of one occurring in a specific region within a few years, but they’re useless for informing folks about when they should evacuate their homes.

The USGS warns that anyone who claims to know when an earthquake is coming based on signs like animal behavior, cloud patterns, or bodily aches is...wrong.

Are there any solutions? Not many. Systems like ShakeAlert (used on the US West Coast) can detect seismic activity at the start of an earthquake and sometimes send out a message to people’s devices up to a minute before they’re hit with heavy shaking.

Looking ahead…scientists are attempting to harness technology to get closer to knowing the likely time and location of potential quakes. However, progress will be incremental, and some experts worry that false alarms may erode public trust in their predictions.—SK

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX3c_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Caef38529>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX3g_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cf70a76d5>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX3k_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C45e5a038>

WORK

The Commutist Manifesto <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX3o_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2D4d8d7635> Scene from La La Land of people dancing on their cars <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX3o_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2E4d8d7635> La La Land/Lionsgate
Like going to bed without watching three episodes of Gilmore Girls, your work commute is good for your brain, a new study claims.

In a paper published in the Organizational Psychology Review, researchers propose <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX0E_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C61ce9a5a> that a daily commute to and from work offers people a “liminal space” in which they can recharge after work and “mentally switch gears” to their home lives—something the commute to your couch can’t provide.

But before you dust off your travel mug…the researchers slapped a big asterisk on their study: Not all commutes are created equal.

While some study participants reported that lengthier travel made them more relaxed and helped them detach from work, some stressful commutes only compounded problems that began at the office. It turns out that staring at the same bumper sticker to a symphony of blaring horns can really take you out of your post-work zen zone.

Big picture: Despite the potential benefits of commuting, Americans might not race back to the office parking garage if they don’t have to. When US workers shifted to WFH during the pandemic, they got a cumulative ~60 million hours of their lives back, according to the New York Fed.—MM

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX0I_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ccdf35c59>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX0M_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C967f0561>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX0Q_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cb515cbba>  

GRAB BAG

Key performance indicators Lebron James
Stat: Way past your bedtime, LeBron James became the NBA’s all-time leading scorer <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX1U_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C464e0626>, topping Kareem Abdul-Jabbar with his 38,388th career point. LeBron has accumulated his points not by pure domination, but by consistency. He led the league in scoring for only one season, but has scored at least 10 points in 1,140 consecutive games (the longest such streak in NBA history).

Quote: “It will have a Hyman Roth death, not a Sonny Corleone death.”

That’s how Bill Simmons responded to the question of whether legacy TV still be around in three years. If you don’t speak The Godfather, here’s more context: Simmons, the founder of The Ringer, predicts that traditional TV won’t completely die out, but will instead limp along much like terrestrial radio has. Not all media experts agree with him—read their thoughts on TV’s future here <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX0Y_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C3ea69b38>.

Read: The astonishing transformation of Austin, TX. (New Yorker <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX0c_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C546cc3a8>)

NEWS

What else is brewing
The US Navy <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX0g_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C7fb7f7a4> released the first photos of its sailors recovering debris from the suspected Chinese spy balloon that was shot down over the Atlantic Ocean.

Disney <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX0k_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C25b29c92> has cut an episode of The Simpsons from its streaming service in Hong Kong that mentioned “forced labor camps” in China.

Labor Secretary Marty Walsh <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX0o_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C494dda29>, last night’s designated survivor, is reportedly leaving the Biden administration to become the head of the NHL Players’ Association.

LIV Golf <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30486121.2993081/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xX0s_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ4NjEyMS4yOTkzMDgx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ccafcd8ce>, the Saudi-backed competitor to the PGA Tour, is generating virtually zero revenue, court documents showed.

[Bleeped out] trivia

South Park returns for its 26th season tonight. And while the 1999 South Park movie was found to have the most swear words of any animated film, it’s not even close to cracking the Top 10 for all movies with the most swear words.

Can you name three of the five movies with the most swear words?

Bonus question: Which actor has uttered the most swears in movies they’ve starred in?

ANSWER

Top five movies with the most swear words: 1) The Wolf of Wall Street 2) Uncut Gems 3) Casino 4) Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back 5) Fury.

And the actor who’s said the most swears in films is Jonah Hill (376 total, and 22.9 per 1,000 words).

 TOGETHER WITH

RAD Diversified <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWDU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzMmbHA9bG9nbw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cd64aa387> 
Good morning. Some corporate announcements yesterday:

Google revealed its answer to ChatGPT: an “experimental conversational AI service” called Bard that’s currently in testing mode.

Microsoft (which invested in ChatGPT) announced its own surprise event scheduled for later today in order to “share some progress on a few exciting projects.”

Chinese tech giant Baidu confirmed it’s on track to introduce its AI chatbot, known as “Ernie Bot” in English, in March.

Let the AI Games begin…

—Jamie Wilde, Sam Klebanov, Max Knoblauch, Abby Rubenstein, Neal Freyman

Here's what these numbers mean. <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy9zMT9taWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmYmY2lkPTMwNDczMzk1LjEwNDc3Mw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C1e8f5583>

Markets: Stocks trended downward <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWFM_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Caf245f1b> yesterday as investors remained skittish about the Fed’s next move. But meme-stock lovers were all in. Flailing retailer Bed Bath & Beyond saw its value nearly double, while GameStop and AMC stocks both rose. Maybe the home goods chain’s faithful are onto something: After the day’s trading ended, the company announced a plan to stave off bankruptcy with a $1 billion share sale.

 

ADVERTISING

This year’s Super Bowl will be the Booze Bowl for ads <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWFQ_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ddb6294d8> Two alcohol bottles wearing football helmets <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWFQ_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Edb6294d8> Hannah Minn
Crypto is out and alcohol is in <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWFU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ced721446> this year during the best part of the Super Bowl: the ads.

Fox announced yesterday that all commercial airtime for Super Bowl LVII is booked up, having sold on average at $6 million for 30 seconds, according to the head of ad sales at Fox Sports—and a lot of those pricey slots went to alcohol companies.

The booze biz has been waiting 33 years for this

Anheuser-Busch (parent company of Budweiser, Stella Artois, and even Natty Light) relinquished the exclusive Super Bowl alcohol advertising rights it held since 1989, and now other brands are keen to get in front of the Super Bowl’s 100 million viewers—many of whom are likely cracking cold ones as they watch.

The global VP of marketing for the Miller brands at Molson Coors told Bloomberg <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWFY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ca687045a> that after hearing the news, “It took us less than 30 seconds to decide that we wanted to buy an ad.”

Heineken, Rémy Martin, and Crown Royal have spots lined up, too.

Anheuser-Busch will still run ads in the game, and will be joined by other familiar (non-booze) brands, including Doritos, Pepsi, and Netflix and GM (it’s a joint ad <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWFc_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C8802475a>).

Who’s not making it to the big game?

Crypto was the QR code-bouncing star of last year’s commercial breaks, but this year celebrities will promote crypto for exactly zero seconds. That’s because Larry David was unintentionally right when he predicted that crypto company FTX wouldn’t make it…in his Super Bowl ad last year for the now-bankrupt FTX.

Though several crypto companies had ads in the works this year, according to a Fox exec, they all pulled the plug after FTX’s collapse dragged the rest of the industry down with it.—JW

For more coverage of Super Bowl ads, subscribe to Marketing Brew <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWTY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C1206e519>.

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWFg_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C5af775ce>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWFk_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C36e01f2c>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWFo_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C25db6ba3>  

WORLD

Tour de headlines The aftermath of the earthquake in Turkey Anadolu Agency/Getty Images
Death toll climbs to more than 4,000 in Turkish earthquake. Rescuers searched <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVTk_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C94515ceb> the rubble in Turkey and Syria for survivors yesterday in the wake of a 7.8 magnitude earthquake, followed by another 7.5 magnitude quake in southern Turkey. Rescue teams have found thousands alive, but the number of victims will also likely increase as their work continues. In addition to the devastating loss of life, ancient sites in the region were damaged, including the Gaziantep Castle in Turkey, which collapsed, and the Aleppo Citadel in Syria.

Two arrested in “racially motivated” power grid plot. Federal authorities announced <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWHo_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cccc3b02f> yesterday that they stopped an alleged plan to bring down Baltimore’s power grid using assault weapons. A neo-Nazi leader and a Maryland woman were arrested last week for allegedly conspiring to attack electrical substations in the area—an act that they purportedly believed would “destroy” the city. Assaults on the power grid are on the rise: There were 171 disturbances traced back to people last year, compared to 99 in 2021, Department of Energy stats show.

Past Chinese spy balloons escaped detection at the time. The 200-foot-tall suspected Chinese spy balloon shot down by the US on Saturday is not believed to be the first to enter US territory in recent years, but it now appears to be the first the US knew about while it was there. General Glen VanHerck, the head of NORAD (which, in addition to tracking Santa, monitors and protects North American airspace) said yesterday <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWTc_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ce45fcff1> that a “domain awareness gap” allowed three others to float on by during the Trump administration that were only discovered by the intelligence community after the fact.



TOGETHER WITH RAD DIVERSIFIED

Tough times call for smarter investments <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWDU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzMmbHA9dGl0bGU/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C0c485991> RAD Diversified <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWDU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzMmbHA9aW1hZ2U/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cc5d9e0e7>
It’s no secret that economic times are a li’l tough right now. What might be a secret, though, is a certain smart investment that’s well-equipped to handle these hard times: REITs (aka real estate investment trusts).

RAD Diversified <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWDU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzMmbHA9dGV4dDE/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C5dcc6690> is a nontraded, SEC-qualified public REIT that is *unaffected* by the stock market. They invest in residential, commercial, and multifamily properties (and even income-producing farms) all over the US.

That’s how RADD <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWDU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzMmbHA9dGV4dDI/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C45ccde0c> is ready to handle any economic era. And they’ve got the numbers to prove it: RADD made a 35.35% return in 2021, and RAD Diversified REIT stock value has increased by 122.2% since October 2019.

Start investing smarter here <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWDU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzMmbHA9dGV4dDM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C590f992c>.



BUSINESS

FTX wants its $93m in political donations back <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWTA_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Dcd164b67> Sam Bankman-Fried under arrest <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWTA_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ecd164b67> Anadolu Agency/Getty Images
FTX is flouting the first rule of gift-giving—no take backs. The bankrupt crypto exchange is telling <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWTE_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ccb2228dc> recipients of its political donations to return the cash they got from its employees by the end of the month or wait for the judge to order it back.

That’s not a small amount: The company’s ex-CEO, Sam Bankman-Fried, was once the second-largest Democratic campaign donor (though he has said he quietly gave just as much funding to Republicans as well).

Over a third of lawmakers in the current Congress have some FTX-associated donation on their campaign ledgers, including heavyweights like Rep. Nancy Pelosi and House Speaker Kevin McCarthy, according <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWTI_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C37a8a9a6> to CoinDesk.

It’s estimated that FTX-related political donations add up to as much as $93 million in total.

Where is the money now?

After FTX was revealed to be allegedly defrauding investors and customers, counting it among one’s donors became more toxic than swimming in a pool of nuclear waste. Many lawmakers chose to wipe their hands by donating the contributions elsewhere. Only five members of Congress had returned the money to FTX as of mid-January, while several others said they were standing by for further instructions.

Looking forward...all of FTX’s donation recipients could eventually be forced to hand back the funds, but courts tend to work much more slowly than election cycles.—SK

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWTM_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cdd7c8960>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWTQ_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C7cd3dd36>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWTU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C91512c7b>

ENTERTAINMENT

AMC introduces the cheap seats <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWEE_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Dca9a89bd> movie theater <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWEE_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Eca9a89bd> Francis Scialabba
AMC already knows you come to their place for magic. Now, you can go there to replicate the energy of shuffling through the Delta first-class cabin with a stale bagel on your way to seat 38E (bathroom adjacent). The theater chain is introducing <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWEI_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C31d70d74> a tiered ticket-pricing scheme based on your seat location, similar to airlines, sporting events, and concerts.

AMC is hoping that charging a bit extra for the middle seats will help boost revenue in a more consistent way than just waiting for new Avatars to come out. The seating tiers, part of a program called Sightline, will reflect the demand patterns you can observe in any theater:

Value: Generally bad front-row seats (for a discount)

Standard: Common seats (for the traditional ticket price)

Preferred: The good middle seats that fill up first (for a premium price)

While the location of your seat will soon impact your ticket price, what movie you’re seeing won’t. The chain can’t vary prices of individual films because tickets are priced by a contract between studios and theaters. Pricing by demand has also been avoided, since it would require more complex monitoring and cost theaters money.

Looking ahead…AMC plans to roll out Sightline at some locations in New York, Chicago, and Kansas City this Friday, and is aiming to expand nationwide by the end of the year.—MK

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWEM_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C374660b2>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWEQ_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cc1a2bd73>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWEU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C8172cfe4>  

GRAB BAG

Key performance indicators A Bachelorette contestant saying The Bachelorette/ABC via Giphy
Stat: One in 10 US adults who have paired off romantically met their partner <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWEY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C7295f1c9> through a dating site or app, according to Pew Research. But not everyone swiping is looking for The One. Some are just searching for Mr./Ms. Right Now: 44% of app users over the past year said they wanted to meet a long-term partner, while 40% wanted to date casually. No word on what percentage of those lived out the rom-com cliche of finding true love when you least expect it, though.

Quote: “You don’t have a recession when you have 500,000 jobs and the lowest unemployment rate in more than 50 years.”

Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen took to the morning show circuit yesterday to reassure us she sees a path forward <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWEc_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C49e33e48> for inflation to come down without stirring up an economic apocalypse. And while Yellen works for the president, she’s not the only one who’s starting to see the possibility of a recession becoming less likely—economists at Goldman Sachs lowered their estimate on the possibility of a recession in the next year from 35% to 25%, thanks to the strong labor market.

(Forbes <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWEg_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C0804ce29>)

AROUND THE BREW

How to offboard like a pro <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWGY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2E02e2e69a> How to offboard like a pro <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30473395.104773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xWGY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ3MzM5NS4xMDQ3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2F02e2e69a>
Offboarding should be streamlined, consistent, and tailored to your business. ANSWER

J. Yes, there is a Q in the abbreviation for the element Ununquadium (“Uuq”). But that is a temporary name, and once this element gets an official name, Q will disappear from the periodic table and be as elusive as J.

Huel <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUzA_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5JmxwPWxvZ28/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C83fcea05>  
Good morning. One small formatting update before we get into the news: In an effort to better organize our recommendations in the “Brew’s Bets” section, we’re going to borrow a page from our Sunday newsletter and call that section the “To-do List” every day of the week. The content isn’t changing a lick—our aim is to add more consistency and clarity for you.

That’s it from me. Have a great day.

—Neal Freyman

Markets: In the five weeks of trading so far in 2023, the Nasdaq has gained in all five and the S&P in four. The still-booming labor market and falling inflation appear to be outweighing poor corporate earnings in investors’ minds.

 

GEOPOLITICS

Spy balloon gets popped <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVEU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2D4734241a> Chinese spy balloon floating in the air <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVEU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2E4734241a> Peter Zay/Anadolu Agency via Getty Images
Nearly a decade into its combat service in the US military, the F-22 Raptor fighter jet finally completed its first air-to-air strike. It took out a balloon.

As excited onlookers watched from Myrtle Beach, the jet climbed to 58,000 feet and downed <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVEY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C17c2c5da> a suspected Chinese surveillance balloon over the Atlantic Ocean on Saturday. The balloon’s debris was scattered across seven miles of the sea—but the geopolitical fallout from its doomed voyage is much wider.

Here’s what you need to know about balloongate.

Why wait to shoot it down? The US knew that the balloon had entered its air defense zone on Jan. 28, well before it floated across North America. President Biden wanted to shoot the balloon down last Wednesday, when it was hovering above Montana, but military leaders recommended waiting until no Americans were in harm’s way when its remnants came crashing down.

Biden was attacked by Republicans, who wanted him to destroy the balloon much earlier and called it a “projection of weakness” to allow a Chinese surveillance tool to enjoy unfettered access to our amber waves of grain. But the Pentagon actually thinks the balloon played into the Americans’ hands—they were able to study the balloon as it floated, and an analysis of the debris will teach them even more about Chinese espionage tactics.

What is China’s response? The foreign ministry called the balloon pop a “clear overreaction” and suggested it could retaliate. China never admitted the balloon was intended for spying—claiming instead it was a meteorology research airship that got blown off its course. The US isn’t buying that.

Were there other Chinese spy balloons? Yes, and pretty recently, too. Chinese surveillance balloons entered US airspace at least three times during the Trump administration and once previously while Biden was president, a senior defense official said. And there’s also one currently floating above Latin America, the Pentagon revealed on Saturday.

What happens next? The balloon drama will only deepen the distrust between rivals US and China—it already led Secretary of State Antony Blinken to call off his planned meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping. But China’s relatively muted response to the balloon downing suggests it may let the hot air blow over...just like the US did.

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVEc_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C870e3ad6>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVTg_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Caebd7f15>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVEk_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C734e2ed1>    

TOGETHER WITH HUEL

One less thing on the to-do list <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUzA_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5JmxwPXRpdGxl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C56f8e647> Huel <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUzA_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5JmxwPWltYWdl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C04760cd6>
Trying to eat healthy without taking too much time out of your day can be a real struggle. Fortunately, Huel <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUzA_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5JmxwPXRleHQx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C31e3a9a7> found a way to bring convenience and nutrition together in one delicious meal.

Huel Black Edition <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUzA_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5JmxwPXRleHQy/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cdd4c89ac> is ready in seconds and packed with 40g of plant-based protein plus 27 essential vitamins and minerals. With just two scoops shaken up with water, you’ll have a nutritious breakfast or lunch in less time than it takes to make a sad sandwich.

Get a taste of convenient nutrition with Huel. Brew readers, score a free shaker + T-shirt with your first order <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUzA_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5JmxwPXRleHQz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C25d7c17e>.

 

WORLD

Tour de headlines A collapsed building in Turkey Volkan Kasik/Anadolu Agency via Getty Images
Major quake hits Turkey. A 7.8 magnitude earthquake and several aftershocks struck southeastern Turkey <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVTk_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ce2f4dd6a> early today, causing buildings to collapse and sending tremors across other areas of Turkey, Syria, Lebanon, and Israel. The preliminary death toll was at least 195 people, but that number is expected to rise. Compounding the damage: Many of the residential buildings in the region near the epicenter are of low-quality construction, making them susceptible to shaking, per the United States Geological Survey.

Close call at Austin’s airport. A FedEx cargo plane and a Southwest 737 came within 1,000 feet of one another <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVEs_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cac2c8fb6> in a scary moment at Austin-Bergstrom International Airport on Saturday morning. Investigators are looking into the incident, which may have been caused by an air traffic controller double-booking a runway (the Southwest plane was taking off right as the FedEx one was landing). This is the second near-collision in as many months—authorities are investigating a close call on a JFK runway that occurred in January.

Kyrie Irving is headed to Dallas. The Brooklyn Nets are shipping <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVEo_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cc085300d> star Kyrie Irving to the Mark Cuban-owned Dallas Mavericks days after Irving requested a trade. Irving’s four-season ride with the Nets was a bumpy one—he missed 35 home games under NYC’s Covid vaccination policy, and earlier this season was suspended for posting a link to an antisemitic movie on Twitter. Expect a flurry of other moves ahead of the NBA trade deadline on Thursday.

MUSIC

Beyoncé anointed Grammy <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVWE_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2D84f38d9f> Beyonce on stage at the Grammys <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVWE_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2E84f38d9f> Christopher Polk/Variety via Getty Images
Beyoncé cemented her reign on the musical throne last night, becoming the most-decorated artist <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVWI_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ca57a3c37> in Grammy Awards history.

Her four wins, including best dance/electronic album for Renaissance, vaulted her past classical conductor Georg Solti for the most Grammy awards ever. She ended the night with 32.

While Beyoncé was the biggest story of the Grammys, she wasn’t the only story from the award show, which returned to the Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles after several pandemic-altered broadcasts.

Harry Styles won album of the year. His groovy Harry’s House topped entries from Beyoncé, Adele, and Bad Bunny.

A new EGOT was crowned: Viola Davis became the 18th person <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVWM_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cc2954ab5> to win an Emmy, Grammy, Oscar, and Tony after she received a Grammy for the audiobook to her memoir, Finding Me.

The best performance: Certainly the Questlove-produced celebration <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVWg_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C87da8849> of the 50th anniversary of hip-hop.

Didn’t see this one coming: Dr. Dre won the Dr. Dre Global Impact Award.

Looking ahead…the first tickets for Beyonce’s Renaissance Tour, her first solo tour in seven years, go on sale today <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVWQ_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C6c220c88>. Ticketmaster has changed its process to avoid being attacked by the BeyHive like it was the Swifties.

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVWU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C1de35057>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVWY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C9779d07a>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVWc_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C42c61750>

GRAB BAG

Key performance indicators Mount Washington Summit Mount Washington Observatory
Stat: Yes, we all know it was really cold in the Northeast on Friday night. But how cold? So cold that New Hampshire’s Mount Washington found itself in the next layer of the atmosphere. Freezing temps caused the atmosphere to compress <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVFQ_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cb63f6f53>, and the dividing line between the troposphere (which we’re in right now) and the stratosphere sank in altitude to below the summit of the mountain.

Quote: “It’s really an amazing day, an awe-inspiring day and actually a bit of a frightening moment.”

Speaking of Mount Washington, there were actually people up there as the wind chill plunged to a record low of minus 108 degrees Fahrenheit. A team of scientists live on the mountain in order to take weather measurements, and one of them—Francis Tarasiewicz—described <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVFU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ce14027cd> to WMUR the thrilling-but-terrifying experience of braving the historic cold this weekend. Tarasiewicz said it was so cold that frostbite would set in after less than a minute.

Read: I hired five people to sit behind me and make me productive for a month. (Simon Berens <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVFY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cec8c2909>)

What else is brewing
Tesla <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVFc_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C5b55aa16> hiked prices on its Model Y by $1,000 after the Biden administration raised the cap on prices for certain EVs eligible for tax credits.

Ukraine <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVFk_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cb469aa1f> is warning of a Russian offensive later this month, around the one-year anniversary of its initial invasion.

An Italian mafia fugitive <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVFo_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cba45c7b0> was arrested in a town in France where he had opened his own pizza parlor.

A Colombian judge <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30462806.3037099/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xVC0_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ2MjgwNi4zMDM3MDk5/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C32676947> used ChatGPT in a court decision—the first known instance in which the chatbot has been included in a legal ruling, per Vice.

Peak trivia

New Hampshire might have Mount Washington, but not all states can boast such great heights.

There are five US states where the highest point of elevation does not exceed 1,000 feet. Can you name them?

  BROWSING

  Classifieds banner image <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30450764.3458534/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUUE_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ1MDc2NC4zNDU4NTM0/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ca234feff> The wackiest headlines from the week as they would appear in a Classifieds section...

Careers

DELI SLICERS WANTED: As part of its turnaround plan, Subway wants to start slicing its meat <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30450764.3458534/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUUI_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ1MDc2NC4zNDU4NTM0/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C36197ee7> in front of customers to give them a “better perception of seeing the nice, fluffy meat,” according to CEO John Chidsey. Those machines are oddly satisfying…

CHELSEA SEEKING HR SPECIALIST: Chelsea FC could use onboarding support after spending a breathtaking amount <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30450764.3458534/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUUM_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ1MDc2NC4zNDU4NTM0/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C18647e13> on new players in January. Under new American ownership, the Premier League club forked over $370+ million for talent last month—that’s more than every team in the top Spanish, German, French, and Italian leagues spent combined.

Real estate

EX-PRESIDENT LOOKING FOR FLORIDA SUBLET: Brazil’s former President Jair Bolsonaro, who’s already been chilling in Florida since late December, applied for a visa to stay six months longer <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30450764.3458534/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUUQ_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ1MDc2NC4zNDU4NTM0/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C1b4a45f5>. He’s not exactly rushing back to Brazil, where he’s facing multiple investigations.

BRITISH MONARCH SEEKS NEW BANK-NOTE HOME: Australia has decided to replace <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30450764.3458534/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUUU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ1MDc2NC4zNDU4NTM0/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C951487f8> an illustration of Queen Elizabeth on its A$5 bank note with an indigenous design.

Personal

Paramount Global said this week it’s folding Showtime into Paramount+ and rebranding <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30450764.3458534/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUUY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ1MDc2NC4zNDU4NTM0/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C2b4b0437> it to “Paramount+ With Showtime.”

TOGETHER WITH APOLLO GLOBAL MANAGEMENT

Raising up retirees
Apollo Global Management <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30450764.3458534/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUXk_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ1MDc2NC4zNDU4NTM0JmxwPWltYWdl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cef3f63f5>
We all want our golden years to be…well, golden. That’s why it’s never too early to start thinking about retirement. Fortunately, that’s where Apollo <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30450764.3458534/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUXk_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ1MDc2NC4zNDU4NTM0JmxwPXRleHQx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ce20d95d3> can help.

Apollo is on a mission to help people retire better by investing in tomorrow, today. 

They offer a wide variety of products that provide an alternative to the traditional public markets. Whether providing guaranteed income products through their retirement services business Athene <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30450764.3458534/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUUs_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ1MDc2NC4zNDU4NTM0JmxwPXRleHQy/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C0d2d2cf8> or tailored portfolio and asset management services to external retirement plans, Apollo and Athene’s offerings can help you sail into retirement with some security.

Expand your opportunities with Apollo <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30450764.3458534/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUXk_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ1MDc2NC4zNDU4NTM0JmxwPXRleHQz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C1fd7655e>.


  SNAPSHOTS

  Photo of the week Sky art from the last 747 Flightradar24 There are two ways to announce your retirement: 1) post a video on Instagram or 2) create an epic piece of sky art.

The Boeing 747 chose the latter. The final 747 that will ever be delivered departed <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30450764.3458534/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUU8_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ1MDc2NC4zNDU4NTM0/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C73495df7> Everett, WA, for Cincinnati on Wednesday, but took a two-and-a-half hour detour over eastern Washington to craft one final goodbye message.

The image of the crown is an homage to the 747’s nickname: “the queen of the skies.”

  SCIENCE

  Dept. of Progress Hey Arnold saying Hey Arnold!/Paramount Global Here are some illuminating scientific discoveries from the week to help you live better and maybe even channel your inner Mulder and Scully.

Your friends are good for you. Since the days of Freud, we’ve known that talking helps you feel better, but new research shows that even a single conversation <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30450764.3458534/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUUw_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ1MDc2NC4zNDU4NTM0/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cb66f84b5> with a friend per day is enough to boost your happiness and lower stress. While the conversation needs to be “quality” to improve your day, that can mean anything from deep discussions to just catching up or joking around. And if you need some motivation to leave the house: The study determined in-person interactions were better for well-being than yakking it up in the TikTok comments.

🫦 Virtual temptation might help your IRL relationship. Here’s a use case for the metaverse even Zuck probably hasn’t thought of yet: A research team in Israel found that flirting with a seductive VR character can help fend off infidelity. The team conducted experiments <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30450764.3458534/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUU0_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ1MDc2NC4zNDU4NTM0/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C08fff5e6> where participants strapped on a VR headset, entered a virtual bar, and chatted up the (simulated) bartender. The researchers observed that a little bit of virtual temptation works like an anti-cheating vaccine, inoculating you against IRL threats to your relationship.

The truth is out there, and AI is looking for it. An international group of scientists has begun to use AI to hunt for aliens <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30450764.3458534/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xUU4_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ1MDc2NC4zNDU4NTM0/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C84600b01>—and not by asking ChatGPT “Tell me where aliens are located in the style of Pulp Fiction.” Instead, they’re using machine-learning algorithms to sift through huge quantities of data to detect alien transmitters on distant planets. So far, the tech has helped researchers home in on eight signals with possible extraterrestrial origins (though they disappeared when scientists tried to find them again—those little green creatures are wily).—AR



 

TOGETHER WITH TAXACT

Take the stress out of tax season. With TaxAct’s Xpert Assist, you get unlimited access <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30450764.3458534/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xYWM_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDQ1MDc2NC4zNDU4NTM0JmxwPXRleHQx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C8e0fcc0c> to tax experts who can answer allll your burning tax questions. Their easy-to-use software helps ensure you file confidently, knowing there’s a $100k Accuracy Guarantee if they mess up.
