Markets: Even in 2023, we’re still on that “good news is bad news” grind. Stocks dipped <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY25iYy5jb20vMjAyMy8wMS8wNC9zdG9jay1mdXR1cmVzLWFyZS1kb3duLXNsaWdodGx5LWFzLWludmVzdG9ycy1jb250ZW1wbGF0ZS1mZWQtbWludXRlcy1lY29ub21pYy1kYXRhLmh0bWw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ca1648de4> after new reports showed that the US jobs picture has remained stronger than anticipated—a sign that the Fed will keep hiking rates to slow inflation. We’ll get the clearest sense of the labor market this morning, when the government drops December’s jobs report. US employers are expected to have added 200,000 jobs last month.

Stock spotlight: After crypto-focused bank Silvergate Capital revealed that its finances got rocked by FTX’s implosion, its stock got rocked <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cud3NqLmNvbS9hcnRpY2xlcy9zaWx2ZXJnYXRlLXJhY2VkLXRvLWNvdmVyLTgtMS1iaWxsaW9uLWluLXdpdGhkcmF3YWxzLWR1cmluZy1jcnlwdG8tbWVsdGRvd24tMTE2NzI4OTUyMDc_bW9kPWhwX2xpc3RhX3BvczE/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C802a8366> on the NYSE. The bank suffered $8.1 billion in customer withdrawals following FTX’s collapse and needed to sell assets at huge losses to meet those obligations.

 

ANTITRUST

FTC to noncompete agreements <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly9tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vZGFpbHkvc3Rvcmllcy9mdGMtd2FudHMtdG8tZ2V0LXJpZC1vZi1ub25jb21wZXRlcz91dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249bWImdXRtX21lZGl1bT1uZXdzbGV0dGVyJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bW9ybmluZ19icmV3Jm1pZD03Y2QzZDdlZmNiMmI1ZDFhNmNiZTBiZjA5MzFmNGIyZg/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cb0b0ce89> Finish Him!! screen on Mortal Kombat <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly9tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vZGFpbHkvc3Rvcmllcy9mdGMtd2FudHMtdG8tZ2V0LXJpZC1vZi1ub25jb21wZXRlcz91dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249bWImdXRtX21lZGl1bT1uZXdzbGV0dGVyJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bW9ybmluZ19icmV3Jm1pZD03Y2QzZDdlZmNiMmI1ZDFhNmNiZTBiZjA5MzFmNGIyZg/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Db0b0ce89> Midway Games via Giphy
While the House has spent the last week in Jackass Forever mode, the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) got serious and proposed <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly90aGVoaWxsLmNvbS9idXNpbmVzcy1hLWxvYmJ5aW5nLzM4MDA0ODUtZnRjLXVudmVpbHMtcHJvcG9zYWwtdG8tYmFuLW5vbmNvbXBldGUtY2xhdXNlcy8_dXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW1iJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09bmV3c2xldHRlciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1vcm5pbmdfYnJldw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C2fb8ed25> a new rule yesterday that could impact everyone from Big Tech execs to unpaid social media interns. The potential rule would ban noncompete agreements, a common mechanism used by companies to keep employees from jumping ship and working for competitors.

It’s been a long time coming

In a 2021 executive order, President Biden asked the FTC (led by antitrust shark Lina Khan) to target noncompetes. And the proposal the agency came up with flexes more muscle than it has in the past: The plan would make all new and existing noncompetes illegal, as well as require companies to inform employees that any previous noncompete agreements are void.

Why are noncompetes a thing? They’re pitched as a way to protect trade secrets so someone working at Domino’s doesn’t leave and design a pizza tracker app for Pizza Hut (okay, not a bad idea). But as noncompetes have flooded industries across the board, the FTC—and even the Treasury Department <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuYnVzaW5lc3NpbnNpZGVyLmNvbS9jb21wYW5pZXMtcGF5LXdvcmtlcnMtbGVzcy10aGFuLXdvcnRoLWJpZGVuLXdhbnRzLXRvLWNoYW5nZS0yMDIyLTM_dXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW1iJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09bmV3c2xldHRlciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1vcm5pbmdfYnJldw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C7b584225>—say these clauses are essentially trapping workers in lower wages. Putting an end to the practice could boost wages by $300 billion every year, and release workers from career inertia, per the FTC.

Noncompetes are truly everywhere: In one high-profile case in 2016, Jimmy John’s settled a lawsuit with the Illinois state attorney general’s office, saying it would not enforce its noncompete that barred workers from making subs (and sub-adjacents) within a three-mile radius of any JJ shops for two years. As if Jersey Mike’s would even need those dry sandwich secrets.

Looking ahead…the FTC’s 3–1 vote in favor of the proposed rule is the first step of the agency’s rulemaking process. Next up is 60 days of public comment. But there’s no date set for a final vote, and the plan is sure to face challenges even if it does cross the finish line. The US Chamber of Commerce—which represents a lot of big, powerful corporations—threatened legal action against such a change in 2021.—MM

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZmFjZWJvb2suY29tL3NoYXJlci5waHA_dT1odHRwczovL21vcm5pbmdicmV3LmNvbS9kYWlseS9zdG9yaWVzL2Z0Yy13YW50cy10by1nZXQtcmlkLW9mLW5vbmNvbXBldGVzJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9ZmFjZWJvb2tfc2hhcmU/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C633e5d8c>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cDovL3d3dy5saW5rZWRpbi5jb20vc2hhcmVBcnRpY2xlP3VybD1odHRwczovL21vcm5pbmdicmV3LmNvbS9kYWlseS9zdG9yaWVzL2Z0Yy13YW50cy10by1nZXQtcmlkLW9mLW5vbmNvbXBldGVzJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bGlua2VkaW5fc2hhcmU/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cb7201bf2>   <mailto:?subject=Check%20out%20this%20story%20from%20Morning%20Brew%21&body=FTC%20to%20noncompete%20agreements%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Fmorningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2Fftc-wants-to-get-rid-of-noncompetes%3Futm_campaign%3Dmb%26utm_medium%3Dnewsletter%26utm_source%3Dmorning_brew%0A%0AWant%20more%20great%20content%3F%20Subscribe%20to%20Daily%20Brew%20%E2%80%94%20Delivering%20the%20latest%20business%20news%20from%20Wall%20St.%20to%20Silicon%20Valley%20daily.%0Ahttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fr%2F%3Fkid%3Df2654ef3%26utm_source%3Demail_share%0A> 

TOGETHER WITH THE ASCENT

Zero in on the perfect card <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZm9vbC5jb20vbW1zL21hcmsvdGEtY2MtY2l0aXNpbXAvP3V0bV9zaXRlPXRoZWFzY2VudCZ1dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249dGEtY2MtY28tbWItY2l0aXNpbXAtMDEwNjIwMjMtNS1uYS1uYSZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPWNwYyZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1iJmxwPXRpdGxl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C73526cec> The Ascent <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZm9vbC5jb20vbW1zL21hcmsvdGEtY2MtY2l0aXNpbXAvP3V0bV9zaXRlPXRoZWFzY2VudCZ1dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249dGEtY2MtY28tbWItY2l0aXNpbXAtMDEwNjIwMjMtNS1uYS1uYSZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPWNwYyZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1iJmxwPWltYWdl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cfefdd4ea>
Ya know that ol’ needle-in-a-haystack saying? That’s what it feels like to look for a new credit card with benefits you’ll actually use—nearly impossible, and as boring as the cliché itself.

But your search is over: This card has it all <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZm9vbC5jb20vbW1zL21hcmsvdGEtY2MtY2l0aXNpbXAvP3V0bV9zaXRlPXRoZWFzY2VudCZ1dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249dGEtY2MtY28tbWItY2l0aXNpbXAtMDEwNjIwMjMtNS1uYS1uYSZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPWNwYyZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1iJmxwPXRleHQx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C03b68a68>. What’s the scoop? Peep this one’s features:

0% intro APR on balance transfers for 21 months (that’s one of the longest on the market, BTW)

an additional, lengthy 0% intro APR on purchases

$0 annual fee

Oh, and that’s not all it offers, either. But don’t take our word for it—dig in to this expert review <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZm9vbC5jb20vbW1zL21hcmsvdGEtY2MtY2l0aXNpbXAvP3V0bV9zaXRlPXRoZWFzY2VudCZ1dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249dGEtY2MtY28tbWItY2l0aXNpbXAtMDEwNjIwMjMtNS1uYS1uYSZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPWNwYyZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1iJmxwPXRleHQy/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cc541ca34> for the full details.

Apply for this zero-interest card here <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZm9vbC5jb20vbW1zL21hcmsvdGEtY2MtY2l0aXNpbXAvP3V0bV9zaXRlPXRoZWFzY2VudCZ1dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249dGEtY2MtY28tbWItY2l0aXNpbXAtMDEwNjIwMjMtNS1uYS1uYSZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPWNwYyZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1iJmxwPXRleHQz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C897a896a>.



WORLD

Tour de headlines <#> Allegiant Stadium pays tribute to Damar Hamlin on its facade Ethan Miller/Getty Images
Damar Hamlin is awake. Doctors at the University of Cincinnati Medical Center said the Buffalo Bills safety had woken up <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly9hcG5ld3MuY29tL2FydGljbGUvYnVmZmFsby1iaWxscy1kYW1hci1oYW1saW4tdXBkYXRlcy1jMDg2ZTQ3MmIxMGI0ZTc5Y2QyNDUwMmJjYmYyZTA5Yj91dG1fc291cmNlPWhvbWVwYWdlJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09VG9wTmV3cyZ1dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249cG9zaXRpb25fMDI/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cf1190b4a> on Wednesday night, two days after he had gone into cardiac arrest during an NFL game and was sedated. Hamlin has been able to communicate via writing, and his first question was whether the Bills won their game against the Cincinnati Bengals. The doctors responded: “The answer is yes, Damar, you won the game of life.” That Bills–Bengals game has been canceled by the league, but NFL teams are still preparing to play in an anything-but-normal Week 18 this upcoming weekend.

Pineapple Express slams California with wind and rain. A weather event known as a Pineapple Express storm has caused thousands of power outages and at least two deaths in California, which has been under a state of emergency since Wednesday. The storm brings <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubnByLm9yZy8yMDIzLzAxLzA1LzExNDcxMDI5NjgvY2FsaWZvcm5pYS1zdG9ybS13ZWF0aGVyLXBpbmVhcHBsZS1leHByZXNzLWF0bW9zcGhlcmljLXJpdmVyP3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1tYiZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPW5ld3NsZXR0ZXImdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1tb3JuaW5nX2JyZXc/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C2e657d59> with it 100+ mph winds and buckets of rainfall, which has led to flash flooding and landslides in parts of the state. Parts of Northern California were evacuated or placed under weather advisory, and forecasters have warned that more storm systems are expected to hit the area next week.

Drama at the southern border ahead of Biden’s visit. The president is planning to visit the US–Mexico border for the first time in his tenure on Sunday, and before his trip he announced tighter restrictions <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly9hcG5ld3MuY29tL2FydGljbGUvcG9saXRpY3MtbWV4aWNvLWltbWlncmF0aW9uLWFmMDY0M2E0ZmI4ZjQ1Mzg4ZmUyNDdlNDRjOWIyYzVlP3V0bV9zb3VyY2U9aG9tZXBhZ2UmdXRtX21lZGl1bT1Ub3BOZXdzJnV0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1wb3NpdGlvbl8wNA/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cc650513e> on migrants who try to come into the US without authorization, telling them to apply for asylum in their home countries instead. Meanwhile, Mexico arrested the son of drug lord “El Chapo,” who is himself allegedly one of the top traffickers of the deadly opioid fentanyl.

RETAIL

Bed Bath & Beyond says it’s reached its limit <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly9tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vZGFpbHkvc3Rvcmllcy9iZWQtYmF0aC1iZXlvbmQtcG90ZW50aWFsLWJhbmtydXB0Y3k_dXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW1iJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09bmV3c2xldHRlciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1vcm5pbmdfYnJldyZtaWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmY/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2D3658471a> Bed Bath & Beyond bankruptcy <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly9tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vZGFpbHkvc3Rvcmllcy9iZWQtYmF0aC1iZXlvbmQtcG90ZW50aWFsLWJhbmtydXB0Y3k_dXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW1iJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09bmV3c2xldHRlciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1vcm5pbmdfYnJldyZtaWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmY/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2E3658471a> Photo Illustration: Dianna “Mick” McDougall, Source: Getty Images
Big January-in-the-Northeast vibes out of Bed Bath & Beyond yesterday, as the company announced <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubnl0aW1lcy5jb20vMjAyMy8wMS8wNS9idXNpbmVzcy9iZWQtYmF0aC1iZXlvbmQtYmFua3J1cHRjeS5odG1sP3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1tYiZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPW5ld3NsZXR0ZXImdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1tb3JuaW5nX2JyZXc/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ce6c88968> in a public filing that it has “substantial doubt” about its ability to continue and could potentially file for bankruptcy.

BBBY expects to report a 33% sales decline compared to Q3 last year (which included Black Friday). The company anticipates losses to reach $385.8 million—a 40% spike from last year—and warned that it may not have cash for suppliers and lease agreements in the coming months. In response, shares fell to their lowest level in ~30 years, marking a 96% decline from the stock’s recent peak during its period in the memestock limelight (more on that in a bit).

What happened? Maybe shoppers are just less impressed by towels these days. But more likely the retailer also committed a self-own by replacing big brands with private labels amid supply chain snarls and at a time when pandemic-era shoppers wanted to shell out for a Kitchen-Aid. Sales fell flat due to supply chain issues and underinvestment in the BBBY website.

There was also the issue of meme stock investor Ryan Cohen, who announced a ~10% stake in the company in March, which prompted retail investors to also pile in. In August, however, Cohen exited <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubW9ybmluZ2JyZXcuY29tL2RhaWx5L3N0b3JpZXMvYmVkLWJhdGgtYW5kLWJleW9uZC1tZW1lLXN0b2NrLXJlYm9vdD91dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249bWImdXRtX21lZGl1bT1uZXdzbGV0dGVyJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bW9ybmluZ19icmV3Jm1pZD03Y2QzZDdlZmNiMmI1ZDFhNmNiZTBiZjA5MzFmNGIyZg/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C57dbc378> his position and shares plummeted 45%.—MK

If you’re shopping for more retail news, sign up for Retail Brew <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cucmV0YWlsYnJldy5jb20vP3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1tYiZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPW5ld3NsZXR0ZXImdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1tb3JuaW5nX2JyZXcmbWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJm/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C7ed2ea08>.

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZmFjZWJvb2suY29tL3NoYXJlci5waHA_dT1odHRwczovL21vcm5pbmdicmV3LmNvbS9kYWlseS9zdG9yaWVzL2JlZC1iYXRoLWJleW9uZC1wb3RlbnRpYWwtYmFua3J1cHRjeSZ1dG1fc291cmNlPWZhY2Vib29rX3NoYXJl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C1b78a0ab>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cDovL3d3dy5saW5rZWRpbi5jb20vc2hhcmVBcnRpY2xlP3VybD1odHRwczovL21vcm5pbmdicmV3LmNvbS9kYWlseS9zdG9yaWVzL2JlZC1iYXRoLWJleW9uZC1wb3RlbnRpYWwtYmFua3J1cHRjeSZ1dG1fc291cmNlPWxpbmtlZGluX3NoYXJl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ca2763a0e>   <mailto:?subject=Check%20out%20this%20story%20from%20Morning%20Brew%21&body=Bed%20Bath%20%26amp%3B%20Beyond%20says%20it%E2%80%99s%20reached%20its%20limit%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Fmorningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2Fbed-bath-beyond-potential-bankruptcy%3Futm_campaign%3Dmb%26utm_medium%3Dnewsletter%26utm_source%3Dmorning_brew%0A%0AWant%20more%20great%20content%3F%20Subscribe%20to%20Daily%20Brew%20%E2%80%94%20Delivering%20the%20latest%20business%20news%20from%20Wall%20St.%20to%20Silicon%20Valley%20daily.%0Ahttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fr%2F%3Fkid%3Df2654ef3%26utm_source%3Demail_share%0A>

FOOD & BEV

Everyone’s becoming a non-alcoholic <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly9tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vZGFpbHkvc3Rvcmllcy8yMDIzLzAxLzA1L25vbmFsY29ob2xpYy1iZWVyLXdpbmUtYW5kLXNwaXJpdHM_dXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW1iJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09bmV3c2xldHRlciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1vcm5pbmdfYnJldyZtaWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmY/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C77a5cba3> 0% ABV labeled beer taps <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly9tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vZGFpbHkvc3Rvcmllcy8yMDIzLzAxLzA1L25vbmFsY29ob2xpYy1iZWVyLXdpbmUtYW5kLXNwaXJpdHM_dXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW1iJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09bmV3c2xldHRlciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1vcm5pbmdfYnJldyZtaWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmY/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2D77a5cba3> Francis Scialabba
Nonalcoholic beer, wine, and spirits are grabbing headlines because it’s Dry January—the month when people stop drinking <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubnByLm9yZy9zZWN0aW9ucy9tb25leS8yMDIzLzAxLzAzLzExNDQ2MjE2NDEvbm9uYWxjb2hvbGljLWJlZXItd2luZS1zcGlyaXRzLWRyeS1qYW51YXJ5P3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1tYiZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPW5ld3NsZXR0ZXImdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1tb3JuaW5nX2JyZXc/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cef080b18> and the worst time to go on a family vacation. But it turns out that drinking 0% ABV lagers has turned into a year-round phenomenon for health-conscious customers.

Retail sales of nonalcoholic beverages grew more than 20% last year, and 120% over three years, per Nielsen.

IWSR Drinks Market Analysis estimates <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZm94YnVzaW5lc3MuY29tL2xpZmVzdHlsZS9iZXlvbmQtZHJ5LWphbnVhcnktcmlzZS1ub24tYWxjb2hvbGljLWRyaW5rcy1hZHVsdC1iZXZlcmFnZS1tYXJrZXQ_dXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW1iJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09bmV3c2xldHRlciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1vcm5pbmdfYnJldw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2B33d66f62> the sector will expand more than 25% in the US by 2027.

Beer giants Ab Inbev and Heineken have launched <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY25iYy5jb20vMjAyMi8xMi8zMC9ub24tYWxjb2hvbGljLWJlZXItc2V0LXRvLWNvbnRpbnVlLXRvLWdyb3ctaW4tMjAyMy5odG1sP3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1tYiZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPW5ld3NsZXR0ZXImdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1tb3JuaW5nX2JyZXc/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C6a21cab6> O’Douls competitors, and so have nonalcoholic breweries like Athletic Brewing Co.—which recently raised $50 million from Keurig Dr. Pepper. Alcohol-free wine and spirits represent much smaller pieces of the category’s sales pie, but new brands pedaling adaptogens, nootropics, and whatever else Erewhon marks up have been launched by celebs including Bella Hadid and Katy Perry.

Meanwhile, sales of alcoholic beer and wine have declined year over year, and alcoholic spirit sales grew less than 1% annually.

That’s not to say people are teetotaling. Actually, over eight in 10 people who buy nonalcoholic drinks also buy alcoholic drinks. Plus, the nonalcoholic drinks sector, despite its recent growth, is a shot glass to Big Alcohol’s das boot, with the former representing a tiny 0.47% of the broader buzzed industry.—JW

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZmFjZWJvb2suY29tL3NoYXJlci5waHA_dT1odHRwczovL21vcm5pbmdicmV3LmNvbS9kYWlseS9zdG9yaWVzLzIwMjMvMDEvMDUvbm9uYWxjb2hvbGljLWJlZXItd2luZS1hbmQtc3Bpcml0cyZ1dG1fc291cmNlPWZhY2Vib29rX3NoYXJl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C571bbfc1>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cDovL3d3dy5saW5rZWRpbi5jb20vc2hhcmVBcnRpY2xlP3VybD1odHRwczovL21vcm5pbmdicmV3LmNvbS9kYWlseS9zdG9yaWVzLzIwMjMvMDEvMDUvbm9uYWxjb2hvbGljLWJlZXItd2luZS1hbmQtc3Bpcml0cyZ1dG1fc291cmNlPWxpbmtlZGluX3NoYXJl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cf27c1c16>   <mailto:?subject=Check%20out%20this%20story%20from%20Morning%20Brew%21&body=Everyone%E2%80%99s%20becoming%20a%20non-alcoholic%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Fmorningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2F2023%2F01%2F05%2Fnonalcoholic-beer-wine-and-spirits%3Futm_campaign%3Dmb%26utm_medium%3Dnewsletter%26utm_source%3Dmorning_brew%0A%0AWant%20more%20great%20content%3F%20Subscribe%20to%20Daily%20Brew%20%E2%80%94%20Delivering%20the%20latest%20business%20news%20from%20Wall%20St.%20to%20Silicon%20Valley%20daily.%0Ahttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fr%2F%3Fkid%3Df2654ef3%26utm_source%3Demail_share%0A>

GRAB BAG

Key performance indicators <#> A pill filled with money Francis Scialabba
Stat: New medicines launched by US drugmakers reached a median price of $222,003 <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cucmV1dGVycy5jb20vYnVzaW5lc3MvaGVhbHRoY2FyZS1waGFybWFjZXV0aWNhbHMvdXMtbmV3LWRydWctcHJpY2UtZXhjZWVkcy0yMDAwMDAtbWVkaWFuLTIwMjItMjAyMy0wMS0wNS8_dXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW1iJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09bmV3c2xldHRlciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1vcm5pbmdfYnJldw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Caa29d7be>last year, according to Reuters. These astronomical prices were fueled by three uber-expensive gene therapies approved by the FDA—one of them, from Hemgenix, costs $3.5 million, making it the most expensive drug ever. Congress did cap annual drug price increases via the Inflation Reduction Act, but that doesn’t cover the cost of new medications. Drugmakers, meanwhile, say the cost of their drugs doesn’t reflect what patients pay out-of-pocket for them.

Quote: “Maybe we cried too much last year.”

The CFO of Walgreens acknowledged that the company was being overdramatic <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY25iYy5jb20vMjAyMy8wMS8wNS93YWxncmVlbnMtbWF5LWhhdmUtb3ZlcnN0YXRlZC10aGVmdC1jb25jZXJucy5odG1sP3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1tYiZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPW5ld3NsZXR0ZXImdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1tb3JuaW5nX2JyZXc/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cee32fdb4> about the effects of theft on its business. Last year, the retailer warned that increased theft (or “shrinkage,” in industry terms) would account for a meaty 3.5% of sales, so it hired private security guards and barricaded toiletries like they were the “Mona Lisa.” But apparently the level of shrinkage hasn’t been significant and those guards weren’t effective, so it’s winding down its use of private security companies.

Read: The “breakthrough” obesity drugs that have stunned researchers. (Nature <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubmF0dXJlLmNvbS9hcnRpY2xlcy9kNDE1ODYtMDIyLTA0NTA1LTc_dXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW1iJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09bmV3c2xldHRlciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1vcm5pbmdfYnJldw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C500ee4d6>)

QUIZ

Happy new quiz <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubW9ybmluZ2JyZXcuY29tL2RhaWx5L3N0b3JpZXMvMjAyMy8wMS8wNS90aGUtYnJldy1zLXdlZWtseS1uZXdzLXF1aXotamFudWFyeS02P3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1tYiZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPW5ld3NsZXR0ZXImdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1tb3JuaW5nX2JyZXcmbWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJm/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Eaeb25b11> Weekly news quiz <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubW9ybmluZ2JyZXcuY29tL2RhaWx5L3N0b3JpZXMvMjAyMy8wMS8wNS90aGUtYnJldy1zLXdlZWtseS1uZXdzLXF1aXotamFudWFyeS02P3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1tYiZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPW5ld3NsZXR0ZXImdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1tb3JuaW5nX2JyZXcmbWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJm/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Faeb25b11>

WHAT ELSE IS BREWING

South Carolina’s Supreme Court <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly9hcG5ld3MuY29tL2FydGljbGUvYWJvcnRpb24tcG9saXRpY3MtaGVhbHRoLXNvdXRoLWNhcm9saW5hLXN0YXRlLWdvdmVybm1lbnQtNmNkMTQ2OWRiYjU1MGM3MGI2NGEzMGYxODNiZTIwM2M_dXRtX3NvdXJjZT1ob21lcGFnZSZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPVRvcE5ld3MmdXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPXBvc2l0aW9uXzA4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cdaaaf290> struck down an abortion ban after about six weeks of pregnancy, saying it violates the state constitution.

ChatGPT’s creator <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cud3NqLmNvbS9hcnRpY2xlcy9jaGF0Z3B0LWNyZWF0b3Itb3BlbmFpLWlzLWluLXRhbGtzLWZvci10ZW5kZXItb2ZmZXItdGhhdC13b3VsZC12YWx1ZS1pdC1hdC0yOS1iaWxsaW9uLTExNjcyOTQ5Mjc5P21vZD1ocF9sZWFkX3BvczY/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C58f98fda>, OpenAI, is considering selling shares at a valuation of around $29 billion, which would make it one of the most valuable private US startups, per the WSJ.

Russian President Vladimir Putin <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly9hcG5ld3MuY29tL2FydGljbGUva3lpdi1ydXNzaWEtdWtyYWluZS13YXItZ292ZXJubWVudC03YTRkZjQ5ODcwN2JiMDQ3ZDJhMzIyMDA1Yzg2MWZkMD91dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249bWImdXRtX21lZGl1bT1uZXdzbGV0dGVyJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bW9ybmluZ19icmV3/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C7cc1da2d> ordered his military to observe a 36-hour ceasefire for Orthodox Christmas. Ukrainians dismissed it as propaganda to buy time for Russian troops to regroup.

Delta <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly90ZWNoY3J1bmNoLmNvbS8yMDIzLzAxLzA1L2RlbHRhLWxhdW5jaGVzLWZyZWUtd2lmaS8_dXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW1iJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09bmV3c2xldHRlciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1vcm5pbmdfYnJldw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C78f9425e> is launching free wi-fi for members of its frequent flier program starting Feb. 1.

Here’s all the stock trades <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly91bnVzdWFsd2hhbGVzLmNvbS9wb2xpdGljcy9hcnRpY2xlL2NvbmdyZXNzLXRyYWRpbmctcmVwb3J0LTIwMjI_dXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW1iJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09bmV3c2xldHRlciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1vcm5pbmdfYnJldw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2B5bc20f12> members of Congress made last year.



BREW'S BETS

Where to look for 2023 trends: Usually they show up on Pinterest <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly9idXNpbmVzcy5waW50ZXJlc3QuY29tL2VuLXVzL3BpbnRlcmVzdC1wcmVkaWN0cy8_dXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW1iJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09bmV3c2xldHRlciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1vcm5pbmdfYnJldw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cc2b8e949> before anywhere else.

Hope you like sequels and spinoffs: The movies <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30167710.3067832/aHR0cHM6Ly90d2l0dGVyLmNvbS9kYXZlX2tlaHIvc3RhdHVzLzE2MTAyODg1MDkxMzQyMDA4MzQ_cz0yMCZ0PXY5U0tvNmt3dlRpU0dzYm0xRlVZYXc/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ceabc4fbd> that are coming to theaters this year.

Friday puzzle

This is an unusual paragraph. I’m curious as to just how quickly you can find out what is so unusual about it. It looks so ordinary and plain that you would think nothing was wrong with it. In fact, nothing is wrong with it! It is highly unusual though. Study it and think about it. You still may not find anything odd. But if you work at it a bit, you might find out. Try to do so without any coaching.

ANSWER

There is no letter “e,” which is the most commonly used letter in the English language.

 TOGETHER WITH

Primal Kitchen <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cucHJpbWFsa2l0Y2hlbi5jb20vcGFnZXMvbW9ybmluZ2JyZXc_dXRtX3NvdXJjZT1Nb3JuaW5nQnJldyZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPUphbjQmdXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPU1vcm5pbmdCcmV3JmxwPWxvZ28/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C665ca8c4> 
Good morning. Sometimes workplace dreams do come true. In an attempt to “purge” employees’ calendars, the e-commerce company Shopify said it’s banning recurring meetings with three or more people, limiting big meetings to one per week, and urging staff to turn down other meeting requests.

Maybe something to bring up at your next meeting during the 15 seconds of heavy breathing after you ask how everyone’s weekend was.

—Max Knoblauch, Matty Merritt, Sam Klebanov, Abby Rubenstein, Neal Freyman

Markets: Investors are hoping 2023 will be brighter than the abysmal 2022, but they didn’t get a lot to cheer about on the year’s first trading day. Stocks closed lower <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY25iYy5jb20vMjAyMy8wMS8wMi9zdG9jay1tYXJrZXQtZnV0dXJlcy1vcGVuLXRvLWNsb3NlLW5ld3MuaHRtbA/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ce0841741>, dragged down in part by Apple, whose market value dipped below $2 trillion on its worst day since June 2021.

 

GOVERNMENT

Congress stalls out before it gets started <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly9tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vZGFpbHkvc3Rvcmllcy9uZXctQ29uZ3Jlc3Mtc3BlYWtlci1lbGVjdGlvbj91dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249bWImdXRtX21lZGl1bT1uZXdzbGV0dGVyJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bW9ybmluZ19icmV3Jm1pZD03Y2QzZDdlZmNiMmI1ZDFhNmNiZTBiZjA5MzFmNGIyZg/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Df9200d28> Austin Powers GIF <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly9tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vZGFpbHkvc3Rvcmllcy9uZXctQ29uZ3Jlc3Mtc3BlYWtlci1lbGVjdGlvbj91dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249bWImdXRtX21lZGl1bT1uZXdzbGV0dGVyJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bW9ybmluZ19icmV3Jm1pZD03Y2QzZDdlZmNiMmI1ZDFhNmNiZTBiZjA5MzFmNGIyZg/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ef9200d28> Austin Powers/New Line Cinema
The newly elected 118th Congress convened for the first time yesterday, getting back to work after some holiday time off. Unlike the rest of us, though, Congress has the added benefit of getting to vote for who their boss will be.

This time around, the process is going—well—historically bad.

GOP leader Rep. Kevin McCarthy failed to win his bid to become the speaker of the House yesterday, falling short of the 218 votes needed to secure the position. While multiple voting rounds for House speaker might sound somewhat ordinary, it’s actually an extremely rare event—it’s only happened 14 times in US history, with the most recent time being 100 years ago and the 13 other instances occurring before the Civil War. Later in the afternoon, McCarthy again fell short in two more rounds of voting.

Why it matters

With a narrow majority in the House, the GOP needs to optimize these early days by organizing and setting the stage for their agenda leading up to the 2024 general election. But, since the speaker administers the oath of office to House members-elect, no business can be done until the position is filled.

Also on hold: appointing chairs and members to key committees (delaying the preparation of bills and hearings), adopting new House rules, and voting on legislation (such as raising the nation’s debt ceiling to keep the government funded).

Coming up…once the dust settles, which hopefully happens faster than it took the 34th Congress to choose a leader in 1856 (133 rounds of voting over a roughly two-month span), the new GOP majority has some plans. Republicans say they want to take on environmental, social, and governance (ESG) investing and probe vaccine mandates and the origins of Covid. They’ve also pledged to change pandemic-induced rules about proxy voting and scale back the IRS expansion included in the Inflation Reduction Act.—MK

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZmFjZWJvb2suY29tL3NoYXJlci5waHA_dT1odHRwczovL21vcm5pbmdicmV3LmNvbS9kYWlseS9zdG9yaWVzL25ldy1Db25ncmVzcy1zcGVha2VyLWVsZWN0aW9uJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9ZmFjZWJvb2tfc2hhcmU/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C2ffcb315>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cDovL3d3dy5saW5rZWRpbi5jb20vc2hhcmVBcnRpY2xlP3VybD1odHRwczovL21vcm5pbmdicmV3LmNvbS9kYWlseS9zdG9yaWVzL25ldy1Db25ncmVzcy1zcGVha2VyLWVsZWN0aW9uJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bGlua2VkaW5fc2hhcmU/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C2a6503d4>   <mailto:?subject=Check%20out%20this%20story%20from%20Morning%20Brew%21&body=Congress%20stalls%20out%20before%20it%20gets%20started%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Fmorningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2Fnew-Congress-speaker-election%3Futm_campaign%3Dmb%26utm_medium%3Dnewsletter%26utm_source%3Dmorning_brew%0A%0AWant%20more%20great%20content%3F%20Subscribe%20to%20Daily%20Brew%20%E2%80%94%20Delivering%20the%20latest%20business%20news%20from%20Wall%20St.%20to%20Silicon%20Valley%20daily.%0Ahttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fr%2F%3Fkid%3Df2654ef3%26utm_source%3Demail_share%0A> 

TOGETHER WITH PRIMAL KITCHEN

No sad salads this year <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cucHJpbWFsa2l0Y2hlbi5jb20vcGFnZXMvbW9ybmluZ2JyZXc_dXRtX3NvdXJjZT1Nb3JuaW5nQnJldyZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPUphbjQmdXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPU1vcm5pbmdCcmV3JmxwPXRpdGxl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C3d68c90d> Primal Kitchen <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cucHJpbWFsa2l0Y2hlbi5jb20vcGFnZXMvbW9ybmluZ2JyZXc_dXRtX3NvdXJjZT1Nb3JuaW5nQnJldyZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPUphbjQmdXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPU1vcm5pbmdCcmV3JmxwPWltYWdl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C185d7016>
Your salads deserve to be happy. And there’s a foolproof way you can resolve to cheer yours up: with delicious salad dressing from Primal Kitchen <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cucHJpbWFsa2l0Y2hlbi5jb20vcGFnZXMvbW9ybmluZ2JyZXc_dXRtX3NvdXJjZT1Nb3JuaW5nQnJldyZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPUphbjQmdXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPU1vcm5pbmdCcmV3JmxwPXRleHQx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ca1295a8f>.

Their avocado-oil-based dressings <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cucHJpbWFsa2l0Y2hlbi5jb20vcGFnZXMvbW9ybmluZ2JyZXc_dXRtX3NvdXJjZT1Nb3JuaW5nQnJldyZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPUphbjQmdXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPU1vcm5pbmdCcmV3JmxwPXRleHQy/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C4a0f177a> are made from purposeful, high-quality ingredients and packed with flavors to make you and your salad smile with every bite. They’ve got the classics like Ranch, Balsamic, and Greek, along with fun favorites such as Cilantro Lime.

Say goodbye to lackluster salads with dreary dressings and shop for Primal Kitchen at all the major spots, including Target, Walmart, and Whole Foods—or snag 25% off your first online order <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cucHJpbWFsa2l0Y2hlbi5jb20vcGFnZXMvbW9ybmluZ2JyZXc_dXRtX3NvdXJjZT1Nb3JuaW5nQnJldyZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPUphbjQmdXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPU1vcm5pbmdCcmV3JmxwPXRleHQz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cd0f52f20>.



WORLD

Tour de headlines <#> A person playing a video game Michael Kraus/Getty Images
🕹 Union achievement unlocked. Around 300 video game testers at Microsoft’s ZeniMax Studios, which counts Fallout among its games, have voted to form a union <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuYmxvb21iZXJnLmNvbS9uZXdzL2FydGljbGVzLzIwMjMtMDEtMDMvdmlkZW8tZ2FtZS10ZXN0ZXJzLWF0LXplbmltYXgtZm9ybS1taWNyb3NvZnQtcy1maXJzdC11cy11bmlvbj9zcm5kPXByZW1pdW0mc3JlZj1La1B6cFp2eg/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C6179f5fe>. Microsoft has formally recognized the union, after having promised labor neutrality over the summer in hopes of getting regulators on board with its bid to purchase Activision. The union is the first ever at Microsoft and the biggest in the video game industry to date.

SBF pleads not guilty. After repeatedly telling news outlets that he had screwed up royally at FTX but never committed fraud, Sam Bankman-Fried pleaded not guilty <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY25iYy5jb20vMjAyMy8wMS8wMy9zYW0tYmFua21hbi1mcmllZC1wbGVhZHMtbm90LWd1aWx0eS10by1mcmF1ZC1jaGFyZ2VzLWluLW5ldy15b3JrLmh0bWw_dXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW1iJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09bmV3c2xldHRlciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1vcm5pbmdfYnJldw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cf5201657> yesterday in a New York federal court to the eight charges against him stemming from the crypto exchange’s collapse. A judge set a trial date of Oct. 2 and said he would grant SBF’s request that the names of the additional guarantors on his $250 million bail stay private, pending motions by the press or others asking that they be released.

🏘 No mortgages for the Canadian-ish. A new law has taken effect in Canada banning <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY25uLmNvbS8yMDIzLzAxLzAxL2J1c2luZXNzL2NhbmFkYS1iYW5zLWhvbWUtcHVyY2hhc2VzLWZvcmVpZ25lcnMvaW5kZXguaHRtbD91dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249bWImdXRtX21lZGl1bT1uZXdzbGV0dGVyJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bW9ybmluZ19icmV3/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C92fe260e> foreign buyers from hoovering up homes in the country for the next two years. Politicians who supported the law are hoping the pause on nonresidents purchasing condos will help cool the blazing housing market that peaked in February with average house prices hitting $800k (CAD). The Canadian Real Estate Association isn’t too happy, though—it claims the measure could force other countries to retaliate and bar Canadians from buying second homes outside of the country.

AUTO

What’s going on at Tesla? <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly9tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vZGFpbHkvc3Rvcmllcy8yMDIzLzAxLzAzL3Rlc2xhLXVuZGVyZGVsaXZlcnMtc3RvY2stdHVtYmxlcz91dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249bWImdXRtX21lZGl1bT1uZXdzbGV0dGVyJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bW9ybmluZ19icmV3Jm1pZD03Y2QzZDdlZmNiMmI1ZDFhNmNiZTBiZjA5MzFmNGIyZg/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2D8b6dc390> Tesla charging station with declining stock price line going through it <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly9tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vZGFpbHkvc3Rvcmllcy8yMDIzLzAxLzAzL3Rlc2xhLXVuZGVyZGVsaXZlcnMtc3RvY2stdHVtYmxlcz91dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249bWImdXRtX21lZGl1bT1uZXdzbGV0dGVyJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bW9ybmluZ19icmV3Jm1pZD03Y2QzZDdlZmNiMmI1ZDFhNmNiZTBiZjA5MzFmNGIyZg/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2E8b6dc390> Francis Scialabba
Good news for anyone who was busy shorting Tesla instead of making New Year’s Eve plans: Tesla’s stock plummeted more than 12% yesterday for its worst trading session in more than two years. The proximate cause: Though the EV manufacturer sent out a record 405,278 vehicles in the last quarter of 2022, it missed <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuYmxvb21iZXJnLmNvbS9uZXdzL2FydGljbGVzLzIwMjMtMDEtMDIvdGVzbGEtbm90Y2hlcy1yZWNvcmQtZGVsaXZlcmluZy00MDUtMjc4LWNhcnMtaW4tZm91cnRoLXF1YXJ0ZXI_c3JuZD1wcmVtaXVtJnNyZWY9S2tQenBadno/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C8766eb44> analyst expectations and its own growth goal for the year.

Tesla’s brutal selloff was the continuation of a dramatic downward trend: The most valuable automaker in the world lost 65% of its value in 2022.

And while it may be easy to pin the blame on CEO Elon Musk’s fascination with his shiny new toy, Twitter, the problems lie deeper than a distracted boss:

Production has slowed down due to Covid shutdowns in China.

Demand has cooled for its vehicles due to lower gas prices, interest rate hikes, and increased competition.

It has suffered from logistical issues that were at least partially to blame for its inability to deliver all of the vehicles that it produced.

Tesla has tried to take steps to boost business, to apparently little effect so far. It recently tried luring lovers of clean-tech luxury with a $7,500 discount in the US. It’s also offered price cuts to customers in China.—SK

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZmFjZWJvb2suY29tL3NoYXJlci5waHA_dT1odHRwczovL21vcm5pbmdicmV3LmNvbS9kYWlseS9zdG9yaWVzLzIwMjMvMDEvMDMvdGVzbGEtdW5kZXJkZWxpdmVycy1zdG9jay10dW1ibGVzJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9ZmFjZWJvb2tfc2hhcmU/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C544bcc1b>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cDovL3d3dy5saW5rZWRpbi5jb20vc2hhcmVBcnRpY2xlP3VybD1odHRwczovL21vcm5pbmdicmV3LmNvbS9kYWlseS9zdG9yaWVzLzIwMjMvMDEvMDMvdGVzbGEtdW5kZXJkZWxpdmVycy1zdG9jay10dW1ibGVzJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bGlua2VkaW5fc2hhcmU/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cfb4f826a>   <mailto:?subject=Check%20out%20this%20story%20from%20Morning%20Brew%21&body=What%E2%80%99s%20going%20on%20at%20Tesla%3F%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Fmorningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2F2023%2F01%2F03%2Ftesla-underdelivers-stock-tumbles%3Futm_campaign%3Dmb%26utm_medium%3Dnewsletter%26utm_source%3Dmorning_brew%0A%0AWant%20more%20great%20content%3F%20Subscribe%20to%20Daily%20Brew%20%E2%80%94%20Delivering%20the%20latest%20business%20news%20from%20Wall%20St.%20to%20Silicon%20Valley%20daily.%0Ahttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fr%2F%3Fkid%3Df2654ef3%26utm_source%3Demail_share%0A>

CANNABIS

More young kids are finding their parents’ stash <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly9tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vZGFpbHkvc3Rvcmllcy9raWRzLXVuZGVyLTYtZWF0aW5nLWVkaWJsZXMtc2F3LWluY3JlYXNlP3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1tYiZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPW5ld3NsZXR0ZXImdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1tb3JuaW5nX2JyZXcmbWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJm/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2D9fab825b> Weed gummies in a pile with marijuana flower. <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly9tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vZGFpbHkvc3Rvcmllcy9raWRzLXVuZGVyLTYtZWF0aW5nLWVkaWJsZXMtc2F3LWluY3JlYXNlP3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1tYiZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPW5ld3NsZXR0ZXImdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1tb3JuaW5nX2JyZXcmbWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJm/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2E9fab825b> Lauri Patterson/Getty Images
Turns out that Snickerdoodle Haze pot laced rice crispy treat is pretty appetizing to kids. Reports of children under the age of six accidentally consuming edibles with marijuana in them have jumped <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly9hcG5ld3MuY29tL2FydGljbGUvbWFyaWp1YW5hLWVkaWJsZXMta2lkcy1yaXNrcy1iZjU1Yzg1YmUyYzI3MjBhNDk4OGU2ZWNlZGFmZGI5NT91dG1fc291cmNlPWhvbWVwYWdlJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09VG9wTmV3cyZ1dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249cG9zaXRpb25fMDk/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C6daef814> 1,375% between 2017 and 2021, according to a new study in the academic journal Pediatrics.

The details: In 2017 there were 207 cases reported to poison control centers in the US. But by 2021 that number jumped to 3,054, totaling 7,043 such incidents in the five-year period. Over half of those reports involved toddlers aged two or three. But before you retweet the “pot smokers are giving my kids edibles for Halloween!” stories, know that 91% of the cases stemmed from kids getting the edibles in their own home.

Why the spike? Medical professionals say the numbers likely spiked as legalization proliferated (37 states + Washington, DC, allow medical marijuana use, and 21 allow recreational use). Plus, some edibles packaging mimics that of non-THC candy or desserts and isn’t childproof.

Big picture: Cannabis ingestion is still just a sliver of the total 850,000 annual poisonings in the under-six age group, but its rapid growth has doctors worried, especially since THC can cause serious complications for kids. Researchers tracked 5,000 specific cases and found that 8% of the kids were put in critical care units at hospitals.—MM

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZmFjZWJvb2suY29tL3NoYXJlci5waHA_dT1odHRwczovL21vcm5pbmdicmV3LmNvbS9kYWlseS9zdG9yaWVzL2tpZHMtdW5kZXItNi1lYXRpbmctZWRpYmxlcy1zYXctaW5jcmVhc2UmdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1mYWNlYm9va19zaGFyZQ/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cf2e0aaa4>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cDovL3d3dy5saW5rZWRpbi5jb20vc2hhcmVBcnRpY2xlP3VybD1odHRwczovL21vcm5pbmdicmV3LmNvbS9kYWlseS9zdG9yaWVzL2tpZHMtdW5kZXItNi1lYXRpbmctZWRpYmxlcy1zYXctaW5jcmVhc2UmdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1saW5rZWRpbl9zaGFyZQ/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ce52ac8cb>   <mailto:?subject=Check%20out%20this%20story%20from%20Morning%20Brew%21&body=More%20young%20kids%20are%20finding%20their%20parents%E2%80%99%20stash%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Fmorningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2Fkids-under-6-eating-edibles-saw-increase%3Futm_campaign%3Dmb%26utm_medium%3Dnewsletter%26utm_source%3Dmorning_brew%0A%0AWant%20more%20great%20content%3F%20Subscribe%20to%20Daily%20Brew%20%E2%80%94%20Delivering%20the%20latest%20business%20news%20from%20Wall%20St.%20to%20Silicon%20Valley%20daily.%0Ahttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fr%2F%3Fkid%3Df2654ef3%26utm_source%3Demail_share%0A>

GRAB BAG

Key performance indicators <#> A Ford F-Series pickup truck at the factory Jeff Kowalsky/Getty Images
Stat: Ford may have faced major supply chain snarls last year, including running out of its signature blue nameplates, but one problem it didn’t have: moving its F-Series pickup trucks. According to sales figures <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY25iYy5jb20vMjAyMy8wMS8wMy9mb3JkLWYtc2VyaWVzLTIwMjItc2FsZXMtc2hvdy1waWNrdXAtY29udGludWVkLWRlY2FkZXMtbG9uZy1kb21pbmFuY2UuaHRtbD91dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249bWImdXRtX21lZGl1bT1uZXdzbGV0dGVyJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bW9ybmluZ19icmV3/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C8337734a> released by the automaker yesterday, the truck was the top-selling vehicle in the US for the 41st year in a row (and the top-selling truck for the 46th). That comes out to an average of at least one of the trucks selling every 49 seconds in 2022, Ford said.

Quote: “We are deeply moved by the prayers, kind words, and donations from fans around the country.”

The family of Damar Hamlin, who was in critical condition yesterday after going into cardiac arrest on the field during Monday Night Football, expressed <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30146320.3043546/aHR0cHM6Ly90d2l0dGVyLmNvbS9qb3Jkb25yL3N0YXR1cy8xNjEwMzE2Mjc0NzU1NTg0MDAxP3M9MjAmdD1UTzFXYWV1eEVJYzd0Yk05WjUwSXJB/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ce28fb610> their “sincere gratitude for the love and support” shown to the Buffalo Bills player. The NFL said the Bills–Bengals game that was halted after Hamlin collapsed will not resume this week, and no decision has been made yet about whether it will restart later. The league also said it has not yet made any changes to its Week 18 regular season schedule.

Read: How China is building its own alternate AI universe. Good morning and Happy New Year! It feels great to be back on the keys after the break. Thanks as always for reading—we’re grateful that you spend your mornings with us.

Fun fact: We’re now just as close to the start of 2050 as we are to the start of 1996.

—Neal Freyman

Markets: One of the best things about New Year’s is the opportunity for a fresh slate. Let’s hope this empty-for-now Markets graphic fills up with more green than in 2022, when the S&P suffered its worst year since the financial crisis of 2008. This week will be a short one for investors, since markets were closed yesterday for the New Year’s holiday.

 

SPORTS

Bills player collapses midgame, is in critical condition <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.> Buffalo Bills players and staff kneel together in solidarity after Damar Hamlin #3 sustained an injury during the first quarter of an NFL football game <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.> Kevin Sabitus/Getty Images
Buffalo Bills safety Damar Hamlin is in critical condition <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZXNwbi5jb20vbmZsL3N0b3J5L18vaWQvMzUzNjgzNzIvZGFtYXItaGFtbGluLWNvbGxhcHNlcy1maWVsZC1iaWxscy1iZW5nYWxzLXRlbXBvcmFyaWx5LXN1c3BlbmRlZD91dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249bWImdXRtX21lZGl1bT1uZXdzbGV0dGVyJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bW9ybmluZ19icmV3/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C8842d913> at a Cincinnati hospital after he suffered cardiac arrest in the first quarter of last night’s NFL game, according to the Bills. The game, a highly anticipated Monday Night Football matchup between the Bills and the Cincinnati Bengals, was suspended by the league just over an hour after the incident occurred.

What happened: After Hamlin took a hard hit while tackling Bengals wide receiver Tee Higgins, he stood up for several seconds and then fell to the ground. Medical personnel rushed to attend to Hamlin, administered CPR, and gave him oxygen before he was taken off the field in an ambulance, per the ESPN broadcast.

During those moments, “this went from a sports story to a news story, from a sporting event to a matter of life and death,” announcer Joe Buck said on ESPN. Players became emotional on the field, praying together for Hamlin’s health.

The NFL also drew criticism for its handling of the situation

The ESPN broadcast booth said that shortly after the incident, players were given five minutes to warm up before play would restart. Then, the coaches of the two teams met and the players left the field. Many sports analysts and fans questioned why it took so long for the NFL to postpone the game, arguing that the players were clearly in no condition to resume playing after witnessing Hamlin receive CPR on the field.

Big picture: This frightening moment was a reminder of the violence inherent in one of the world’s biggest entertainment properties, and how the players are, in the end, humans—not just items on a fantasy football roster. And Hamlin appears to be a person who’s especially generous. Starting in 2020, Hamlin raised money to run a toy drive for children in his Pennsylvania hometown. In the hours following his collapse, fans found the original GoFundMe <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZ29mdW5kbWUuY29tL2YvbXhrc2MtdGhlLWNoYXNpbmctbXMtZm91bmRhdGlvbi1jb21tdW5pdHktdG95LWRyaXZlP3FpZD0zZmI3N2ViMWQ1OWY0MzQwM2JmOGQwZTZkYmUxNzllYw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cda08d4ea> for the event (initial goal: $2,500) and contributed more than $3 million in donations.

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZmFjZWJvb2suY29tL3NoYXJlci5waHA_dT1odHRwczovL21vcm5pbmdicmV3LmNvbS9kYWlseS9zdG9yaWVzLzIwMjMvMDEvMDMvZGFtYXItaGFtbGluLWNvbGxhcHNlcy1kdXJpbmctbmZsLWdhbWUtaW4tY3JpdGljYWwtY29uZGl0aW9uJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9ZmFjZWJvb2tfc2hhcmU/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C927e67d8>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cDovL3d3dy5saW5rZWRpbi5jb20vc2hhcmVBcnRpY2xlP3VybD1odHRwczovL21vcm5pbmdicmV3LmNvbS9kYWlseS9zdG9yaWVzLzIwMjMvMDEvMDMvZGFtYXItaGFtbGluLWNvbGxhcHNlcy1kdXJpbmctbmZsLWdhbWUtaW4tY3JpdGljYWwtY29uZGl0aW9uJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bGlua2VkaW5fc2hhcmU/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cd2de1a4c>   <mailto:?subject=Check%20out%20this%20story%20from%20Morning%20Brew%21&body=Bills%20player%20collapses%20midgame%2C%20is%20in%20critical%20condition%3A%20https%3A%2F%2Fmorningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2F2023%2F01%2F03%2Fdamar-hamlin-collapses-during-nfl-game-in-critical-condition%3Futm_campaign%3Dmb%26utm_medium%3Dnewsletter%26utm_source%3Dmorning_brew%0A%0AWant%20more%20great%20content%3F%20Subscribe%20to%20Daily%20Brew%20%E2%80%94%20Delivering%20the%20latest%20business%20news%20from%20Wall%20St.%20to%20Silicon%20Valley%20daily.%0Ahttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fr%2F%3Fkid%3Df2654ef3%26utm_source%3Demail_share%0A>  

TOGETHER WITH FUNDRISE

Invest smarter, not harder <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly9mdW5kcmlzZS5jb20vYWNxLXBsdXMvc3RhcnQ_dXRtX21lZGl1bT1uZXdzbGV0dGVyJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bW9ybmluZ2JyZXcmdXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW5ld3NsZXR0ZXItbW9ybmluZ2JyZXctcHJpbWFyeXN0YXRpYy0yMDIzMDEwMyZscD10aXRsZQ/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C7c43442f> Fundrise <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly9mdW5kcmlzZS5jb20vYWNxLXBsdXMvc3RhcnQ_dXRtX21lZGl1bT1uZXdzbGV0dGVyJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bW9ybmluZ2JyZXcmdXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW5ld3NsZXR0ZXItbW9ybmluZ2JyZXctcHJpbWFyeXN0YXRpYy0yMDIzMDEwMyZscD1pbWFnZQ/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C7d6df771>
There are a lotta ways to diversify your portfolio, but not many that are built specifically to protect your investment as much as they are to capture growth. There is one alternative investment manager to put on your radar that stands above the rest.

We know what you’re thinking: In this economy?

That’s right—we’re talking about Fundrise. With a decade-long track record of outperformance through various market environments, they can help you invest smarter by adding real estate private equity to your portfolio. Even better, Fundrise expects 2023 to be one of the most opportune real estate investing environments of the last decade. 

Find out how Fundrise’s real estate portfolio <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly9mdW5kcmlzZS5jb20vYWNxLXBsdXMvc3RhcnQ_dXRtX21lZGl1bT1uZXdzbGV0dGVyJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bW9ybmluZ2JyZXcmdXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW5ld3NsZXR0ZXItbW9ybmluZ2JyZXctcHJpbWFyeXN0YXRpYy0yMDIzMDEwMyZscD10ZXh0MQ/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C6b588a6a> is well positioned for the long haul and join over 350k other investors here <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly9mdW5kcmlzZS5jb20vYWNxLXBsdXMvc3RhcnQ_dXRtX21lZGl1bT1uZXdzbGV0dGVyJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bW9ybmluZ2JyZXcmdXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW5ld3NsZXR0ZXItbW9ybmluZ2JyZXctcHJpbWFyeXN0YXRpYy0yMDIzMDEwMyZscD10ZXh0Mg/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C79e94091>.

 

WORLD

Tour de headlines <#> President of Brazil Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva greets supporters President of Brazil Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva greets supporters after his inauguration ceremony. Andressa Anholete/Getty Images
Sidelined world leaders make their return. Leftist politician Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (aka “Lula”) was sworn in <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cucmV1dGVycy5jb20vd29ybGQvYW1lcmljYXMvbHVsYS1yZXR1cm5zLW9mZmljZS10cm91YmxlZC1kaXZpZGVkLWJyYXppbC0yMDIzLTAxLTAxLz91dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249bWImdXRtX21lZGl1bT1uZXdzbGV0dGVyJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bW9ybmluZ19icmV3/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cd891cc17> as Brazil’s president on Sunday, returning to the position he once held after defeating incumbent Jair Bolsonaro in a bitter election in October. In Israel, Benjamin Netanyahu was once again sworn as Israel’s prime minister after forming the most conservative coalition government in the country’s history.

Times Square attack suspect arrested. A 19-year-old man was charged <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly9hcG5ld3MuY29tL2FydGljbGUvbnljLW5ldy15ZWFycy1hdHRhY2tlci1hcnJlc3RlZC1iM2RmMWVjYWJlNzE4M2RkZGE2YWYzZjM4NDIwZDZmND91dG1fc291cmNlPWhvbWVwYWdlJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09VG9wTmV3cyZ1dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249cG9zaXRpb25fMDY/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C994f3e6e> with attempting to murder police officers after attacking them with a machete in NYC’s Times Square on New Year’s Eve. A senior law enforcement official said the man, Trevor Bickford, who is believed to have traveled from Maine to NYC to carry out the attack, was motivated by Islamic extremism. Bickford had been reportedly placed on the FBI’s terrorist watch list, per CNN.

Tesla’s on the struggle bus. The automaker delivered <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZnQuY29tL2NvbnRlbnQvNmFiY2RlNTgtYmZmNC00YWJhLTk5YzktMDM1ODJjMDc0ODc3P3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1tYiZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPW5ld3NsZXR0ZXImdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1tb3JuaW5nX2JyZXc/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C3608df88> the most vehicles it ever had in a quarter—405,278 in Q4—but that 11% jump from Q3 still came up short of expectations. Investors have sent Tesla shares down 54% in the past three months due to concern not only for Elon Musk’s preoccupation with Twitter, but also signs of softer demand for Tesla cars. Tesla rolled out an end-of-year $7,500 incentive for some models to juice sales.

STOCKS

Stocks could languish again in 2023 <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly9tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vZGFpbHkvc3Rvcmllcy8yMDIzLzAxLzAyL3N0b2Nrcy1jb3VsZC1sYW5ndWlzaC1hZ2Fpbi1pbi0yMDIzP3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1tYiZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPW5ld3NsZXR0ZXImdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1tb3JuaW5nX2JyZXcmbWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJm/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ddc785682> GIF of John Michael moping around in Arrested Development <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly9tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vZGFpbHkvc3Rvcmllcy8yMDIzLzAxLzAyL3N0b2Nrcy1jb3VsZC1sYW5ndWlzaC1hZ2Fpbi1pbi0yMDIzP3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1tYiZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPW5ld3NsZXR0ZXImdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1tb3JuaW5nX2JyZXcmbWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJm/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Edc785682> Arrested Development/20th Television via Giphy
Stocks are coming off their worst year <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY25iYy5jb20vMjAyMi8xMi8yOS9zdG9jay1tYXJrZXQtZnV0dXJlcy1vcGVuLXRvLWNsb3NlLW5ld3MuaHRtbD91dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249bWImdXRtX21lZGl1bT1uZXdzbGV0dGVyJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bW9ybmluZ19icmV3/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C2949b8b6> since 2008 due to investors misjudging how high inflation would soar and the lengths central banks would go to bring it back down.

The headline stat: Global equities lost a record $18 trillion in 2022 amid nearly 300 interest rate hikes from central banks around the world.

But not all stocks were clobbered equally by Jerome Powell and Co.: High-growth tech companies that got a boost from an era of low interest rates got rocked the most in what some are calling the sequel to the bursting of the dot-com bubble in 2000–01. The tech-heavy Nasdaq posted four straight negative quarters for the first time since that crash.

Others survived unscathed <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cud3NqLmNvbS9hcnRpY2xlcy90aGUteWVhci1iaWctdGVjaC1zdG9ja3MtZmVsbC1mcm9tLWdsb3J5LTExNjcyNTQzOTUyP21vZD1ocF9sZWFkX3BvczM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cb0e0c63e>. The energy sector soared 59% last year thanks to a boost from surging oil prices. Exxon Mobil finished the year as the eighth-most valuable public company in the US, despite starting 2022 outside the top 25.

So what will this year hold?

No one really knows, but analysts generally think stocks will go sideways, weighed down by more rate hikes and a potential recession. The average Bloomberg projection for the S&P at the end of 2023 is 4,009 points (the index closed 2022 at 3,839.50).

Another down year would be extremely rare: The S&P has dropped for two consecutive years in just four instances since 1928.

CALENDAR

The week ahead <#> GOP Leader Kevin McCarthy House GOP leader Kevin McCarthy. Kent Nishimura/Los Angeles Times via Getty Images
New year, new Congress: The 118th Congress will convene today. In a switch-up from the last two years, the GOP has control of the House (but the Dems retained their majority in the Senate). Some key things to watch: whether Kevin McCarthy will be chosen as Speaker of the House today, all the investigations to be launched by Republican lawmakers, and what happens to GOP Rep. George Santos, who admitted to falsifying a significant amount of his background.

Vegas electronics show kicks off: CES, the biggest consumer tech show on the calendar, will return in full force <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubWFya2V0d2F0Y2guY29tL3N0b3J5L2Nlcy1wcmV2aWV3LXRlY2gtd29ybGQtcHJlcGFyZXMtdG8tY29udmVuZS1pbi12ZWdhcy1mb3ItYW5udWFsLXRyYWRlLXNob3ctMTE2NzAzNTI4MDg_dXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW1iJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09bmV3c2xldHRlciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1vcm5pbmdfYnJldw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C15d450e3> starting on Thursday. Companies in this hard-hit sector will show off their futuristic gadgets—some useful, others gimmicky.

Spring break in China? On Sunday, China will no longer require travelers entering the country to quarantine <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuYmJjLmNvbS9uZXdzL3dvcmxkLWFzaWEtY2hpbmEtNjQwOTc0OTc_dXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW1iJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09bmV3c2xldHRlciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1vcm5pbmdfYnJldw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C891466b5>, and will also loosen restrictions on outbound travel. It’s the latest step in China’s chaotic reopening in a bid to revive its economy that has unleashed a massive Covid wave.

Everything else…

Pelé’s coffin will be carried through the streets of Santos, Brazil, today before the late soccer legend is buried. A 24-hour public wake was held yesterday.

The December jobs report is on Friday.

Northern Californians who have already been pummeled with extensive flooding recently have been warned <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubnByLm9yZy8yMDIzLzAxLzAyLzExNDY1NjU1OTkvY2FsaWZvcm5pYS1mbG9vZHMtYXRtb3NwaGVyaWMtcml2ZXI_dXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW1iJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09bmV3c2xldHRlciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1vcm5pbmdfYnJldw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C3121e177> about another powerful atmospheric river that will dump even more rain on the region.

The world’s 500 richest people lost a collective $1.4 trillion in net worth in 2022, according to Bloomberg. Due to Tesla’s stock wipeout, Elon Musk became the first person in history to lose more than $200 billion.

Quote: “We plan to have a clear-eyed, transparent view of what went wrong while still fresh in everyone’s memories.”

Southwest Airlines COO Andrew Watterson told employees that he and CEO Bob Jordan are going to launch a postmortem investigation <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cud3NqLmNvbS9hcnRpY2xlcy9zb3V0aHdlc3Qtc2F5cy1pdC1tYWludGFpbnMtbm9ybWFsLXNjaGVkdWxlLWFzLWl0LXByb2Nlc3Nlcy1iYWdzLXJlZnVuZHMtMTE2NzI2ODgxNTU_bW9kPWhwX2xlYWRfcG9zMw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C608451e3> into the airline’s holiday season meltdown. WHAT ELSE IS BREWING

Russia <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cucmV1dGVycy5jb20vd29ybGQvZXVyb3BlL2RlZmlhbnQtdWtyYWluaWFucy1jaGVlci1uZXcteWVhci1kcm9uZXMtYmxhc3RlZC1za2llcy0yMDIzLTAxLTAxLz91dG1fY2FtcGFpZ249bWImdXRtX21lZGl1bT1uZXdzbGV0dGVyJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9bW9ybmluZ19icmV3/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C1f152b76> issued a rare acknowledgement that 63 of its soldiers had been killed by Ukraine in a New Year’s Eve strike on barracks in the occupied city of Donetsk.

Twitter <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY2JzbmV3cy5jb20vbmV3cy9lbG9uLW11c2stdHdpdHRlci1zdWVkLXJlbnQtbm9ucGF5bWVudC1zYW4tZnJhbmNpc2NvLW9mZmljZS8_dXRtX2NhbXBhaWduPW1iJnV0bV9tZWRpdW09bmV3c2xldHRlciZ1dG1fc291cmNlPW1vcm5pbmdfYnJldw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C83b7e995> is being sued for not paying $136,260 in rent on its SF office space.

Martina Navratilova <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY25uLmNvbS8yMDIzLzAxLzAyL3Rlbm5pcy9tYXJ0aW5hLW5hdnJhdGlsb3ZhLXRocm9hdC1icmVhc3QtY2FuY2VyLXd0YS1zcHQtaW50bC9pbmRleC5odG1sP3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1tYiZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPW5ld3NsZXR0ZXImdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1tb3JuaW5nX2JyZXc/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cdd298de5> has been diagnosed with both breast and throat cancer. In a statement, the tennis legend said the prognosis was good.

The actor Jeremy Renner <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30137291.3482340/aHR0cHM6Ly9hcG5ld3MuY29tL2FydGljbGUvZW50ZXJ0YWlubWVudC1jZWxlYnJpdHktamVyZW15LXJlbm5lci10ZWxldmlzaW9uLXR2LTdmYzkyODJlOWYwZGI2YmE2MzI1MTVlYTg2NTVmYmIwP3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1tYiZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPW5ld3NsZXR0ZXImdXRtX3NvdXJjZT1tb3JuaW5nX2JyZXc/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C81ffd52d> is in critical condition, but stable, following a snow-plowing accident on Sunday.

1923 trivia

We don’t know yet what’ll unfold in 2023, but we do have a pretty good handle on what happened 100 years ago. Here are five questions about 1923.

There were two US presidents in 1923. Can you name one?

Which famous US sports venue hosted its first game that year?

Construction began on a famous harbor bridge in which city?

Siblings Harry, Albert, Samuel, and Jack founded which entertainment company?

1923 is a Western drama that premiered a few weeks ago on Paramount+. What show is it the prequel of?

ANSWER

1. Warren G. Harding and Calvin Coolidge (Harding died in August.)

2. Yankee Stadium

3. Sydney, Australia

4. Warner Bros.

5. Yellowstone
